output: According to one of the sponsors of the bill, the measures can target companies facilitating or providing vessels, insurance, port facilities, or tethering services for those vessels, as well as to those providing certification for Nord Stream 2.

output: The heroin, worth around Rs 1.55 crore in the local market, was smuggled from Myanmar, they said.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Duhkima (62) og sonur hans Remthangpuia (33) voru handteknir með fíkniefnin á föstudagskvöld í þorpinu Ngharchhip, sagði lögregla.
output: Duhkima (62) and his son Remthangpuia (33) were arrested with the drugs on Friday night from Ngharchhip village, the police said.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Þeir misstu einnig um 280 grömm af heróíni, að andvirði um 1,5 milljónir rúpía, þegar þeir syntu yfir á, á flótta sínum undan lögreglu, að því er fram kom hjá embættinu.
output: They also dropped about Rs 280 grams of heroin, worth Rs 15 lakh, while swimming across a river as they tried to flee from the police, officials said.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Samkvæmt upplýsingum frá lögreglu er þetta talið vera eitt mesta magn heróíns sem lagt hefur verið hald á í ríkinu.
output: According to police, the seizure was believed to be the biggest heroin haul in the state.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Hinir ákærðu voru sóttir til saka samkvæmt viðeigandi greinum laga um fíkniefni og ofskynjunarlyf (NDPS) frá 1985.
output: The accused were charged under the relevant sections of the Narcotic Drugs & Psychotropic Substances (NDPS) Act, 1985.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Jafnvel þótt landamæri milli ríkja og við Mjanmar séu lokuð vegna kórónuveirufaraldursins er ekkert lát á smygli á eiturlyfjum og öðrum varningi, samkvæmt upplýsingum lögreglu.
output: Even as the inter-state borders and the one with Myanmar remained sealed in the wake of the coronavirus outbreak, smuggling of drugs and other contrabands continued unabated, the police sources said.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Liðsmenn Assam-rifflanna gripu nýlega 25 flutningabíla hlaðna betelhnetum sem smyglað var frá Mjanmar, en virði þeirra er um 40 milljónir rúpía.
output: The Assam Rifles recently seized 25 trucks loaded with betel nuts, valued at Rs 4 crore, being smuggled from Myanmar, they said.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Læknir hljóp 35 kílómetra með grímu
output: Doctor ran 35 kilometres with face mask

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Breski læknirinn Tom Lawton hljóp á dögunum 35 kílómetra með andlitsgrímu til að sýna fram á að súrefnismettun minnkaði ekki við notkun andlitsgríma.
output: British doctor Tom Lawton ran 35 kilometres in a face mask to prove that oxygen levels are not reduced when face masks are worn.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Lawton er læknir við Bradford Royal-sjúkrahúsið og hefur unnið þar á meðan heimsfaraldurinn hefur geisað.
output: Lawton is a doctor at the Bradford Royal Hospital and has worked there during the pandemic.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Til þess að afsanna kenninguna um súrefnismettun og til þess að hvetja fólk til að vera með andlitsgrímu ákvað Lawton að hlaupa í vinnuna og aftur til baka með grímu.
output: To disprove the theory about oxygen levels and encourage people to wear a face mask, Lawton decided to run to and from work while wearing a mask.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Áður en hann lagði af stað stofnaði hann til söfnunar á GoFundMe fyrir The Trusell Trust sem sér um matargjafir í Bradford og víða um Bretland.
output: Before he set off, he started a GoFundMe campaign in support of the Trussell Trust, which donates food in Bradford and other places around the UK.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Ég er mikill stuðningsmaður alls þess sem heldur okkur öruggum.
output: "I'm a great supporter of everything that keeps us safe.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Þess vegna hef ég verið í áfalli yfir röngum upplýsingum sem hafa borist manna á milli um að andlitsgrímur minnki súrefnismettunina hjá fólki,“ sagði Lawton.
output: That's why I've been shocked by the falsehood that's been spread about face masks reducing people's oxygen levels," said Lawton.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Lawton sagði að hann hefði áður keppt í þríþraut en á meðan heimsfaraldurinn geisaði hefði þolið hjá honum minnkað.
output: Lawton said that he had previously competed in triathlon but that his endurance had been reduced during the pandemic.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Á mánudaginn síðasta hljóp hann kílómetrana 35.
output: He ran the 35 kilometres last Monday.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Ég tók grímuna aldrei af (enginn matur né drykkur) og súrefnismettunin þrjóskaðist 98% í hvert einasta skipti sem ég kíkti,“ skrifaði Lawton á Twitter að hlaupi loknu.
output: "The mask didn't come off at all (no food or drink) and oxygen levels were stubbornly 98% every time I checked," Lawton wrote on Twitter following his run.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Jóakim prins enn á sjúkrahúsi
output: Prince Joachim still in hospital

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Jóakim prins af Danmörku liggur nú á Háskólasjúkrahúsinu í Toulouse í Frakklandi og er ástand hans stöðugt.
output: Prince Joachim has been hospitalised at the Toulouse University Hospital in France and his condition is stable.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Prinsinn gekkst undir heilaskurðaðgerð í gær eftir að hafa greinst með blóðtappa.
output: The Prince underwent brain surgery yesterday after a blood clot had been discovered.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Ástand Jóakims prins er enn stöðugt.
output: "Prince Joachim's condition is still stable.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Prinsinn komst blessunarlega í hendur fagmanna í tæka tíð og líður vel eftir atvikum.
output: Fortunately, the Prince received professional care in time and is feeling reasonably well.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Það er of snemmt að segja til um hve lengi hann verður á spítalanum á þessari stundu,“ segir Lene Balleby, upplýsingafulltrúi dönsku konungshallarinanr, í skriflegu svari til danska ríkisútvarpsins.
output: It is too early to say at this time how long he'll stay at the hospital," says Lene Balleby, the Danish Crown's press officer in a written response to Danish State Radio.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Aðeins eru nokkrir dagar liðnir frá því konungsfjölskyldan fagnaði 18 ára afmæli Felix prins Jóakimssonar, hans næstelsta sonar.
output: It's been only a few days since the Royal Family celebrated the 18th birthday of Felix, Joachim's second oldest son.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Var afmælinu fagnað á víngarði drottningarinnar, Château de Cayx í Cahors í Suður-Frakklandi.
output: The birthday was celebrated at the Queen's vineyard, Château de Cayx in Cahors in the South of France.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Var fjölskyldan enn þar í fríi þegar Jóakim var lagður inn á spítala í gær.
output: The family was still holidaying there when Joachim was admitted to hospital yesterday.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Jóakim, sem er 51 árs, fluttist til Frakklands í fyrra þar sem hann er við nám í herskólanum Ecolé Militaire, fyrstur Dana.
output: Last year, 51 year old Joachim moved to France, where he studies at the Ecolé Militaire military academy, the first Dane to do so.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Þá vinnur hann sem varnarmálasérfræðingur í danska sendiráðinu í París.
output: He also works as a defence specialist at the Danish embassy in Paris.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Frakklandstenging prinsins er sterk enda er faðir hans heitinn, Hinrik prins, franskur og eiginkona hans, María prinsessa, sömuleiðis.
output: The Prince has strong ties to France, both his later father, Prince Henri and his wife, Princess Marie, being French.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Selur íbúðina sem hún hefur búið í í 30 ár
output: Sells the apartment where she has lived for 30 years

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Leikkonan Susan Sarandon hefur sett heimili sitt í New York borg í Bandaríkjunum á sölu.
output: Actress Susan Sarandon has put her New York home up for sale.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Saradon hefur búið í íbúðinni síðastliðin 30 ár og alið upp öll sín börn þar.
output: Sarandon has lived in the apartment for 30 years and raised all her children there.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Húsið sem íbúðin hennar Sarandon er var byggt fyrir fyrri heimstyrjöldina og er í Chelsea hverfinu á Manhattan.
output: The building where the apartment is located is in Manhattan's Chelsea neighbourhood and was built before the First World War.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Ásett verð eignarinnar eru litlar 7,9 milljónir bandaríkjadala eða rúmlega einn milljarður íslenskra króna.
output: The asking price is USD 7.9 million, or more than one billion Icelandic Krona.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Íbúðin er rúmir 560 fermetrar og er á 7. og 8. hæð hússins.
output: The apartment is just over 560 square metres and is on the 7th and 8th floors of the building.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Sarandon keypti húsið upphaflega árið 1991 með fyrrverandi eiginmanni sínum, Tim Robbins.
output: Sarandon bought the house in 1991 with her ex-husband, Tim Robbins.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Þegar þau skildu árið 2011 fékk Sarandon húsið.
output: When they divorced in 2011, Sarandon kept the house.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Sarandon og Robbins eignuðust Jack og Miles saman en fyrir átti hún dótturina Evu.
output: Sarandon and Robbins had Jack and Miles together, and she previously had her daughter, Eva.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Öll börnin þrjú ólust upp í íbúðinni.
output: All three children grew up in the apartment.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Í henni eru sex svefnherbergi, fimm og hálft baðherbergi.
output: It has six bedrooms, five and a half bathrooms.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Íbúðin er björt og falleg og einstaklega fallega innréttuð.
output: The apartment is bright and pleasant with particularly beautiful interiors.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Flugslys í Utah: Barn og tveir fullorðnir létust í brotlendingu í bakgarði
output: Utah plane crash: A baby and 2 adults are killed in a backyard crash

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Sex manns voru um borð í Piper PA-32-flugvél sem brotlenti í bakgarði í borginni West Jordan eftirmiðdegis á laugardaginn samkvæmt Allen Kenitzer, talsmanni Flugmálastjórnar Bandaríkjanna (FAA).
output: The crash happened Saturday afternoon when a Piper PA-32 aircraft carrying six people crashed into a backyard in the city of West Jordan, Federal Aviation Administration spokesman Allen Kenitzer said.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Þrír af þeim sem voru um borð létust, þar á meðal hinn 43 ára gamli flugmaður Lee Wyckoff, 9 mánaða gamalt barn hans og Milda Shibonis, 36 ára, samkvæmt lögregluyfirvöldum í West Jordan.
output: Three people aboard the plane were killed, including the pilot, identified by police as 43-year-old Lee Wyckoff, his 9-month-old baby, and Milda Shibonis, 36, West Jordan police said.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Eiginkona flugmannsins er í lífshættu og 2 ára gamalt barn er með alvarleg brunasár.
output: The pilot's wife is in critical condition, and a 2-year-old child has critical burns.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
12 ára gömul stúlka var meðhöndluð og útskrifuð af sjúkrahúsi í nágrenninu, sagði Jennifer Worthen, talsmaður lögreglunnar í West Jordan, í samtali við CNN á sunnudaginn.
output: A 12-year-old girl was treated at a local hospital and released, West Jordan Police spokeswoman Jennifer Worthen told CNN on Sunday.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
72 ára gömul kona sem var í húsi sem varð fyrir flugvélinni er í lífshættu, kemur fram í Twitter-færslu lögregludeildarinnar frá því á sunnudaginn.
output: A 72-year-old woman who was in a house struck by the plane is in critical condition, according to a tweet Sunday from the police department.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Einnig skemmdust þrjú hús í brotlendingunni að sögn Tauni Barker, talsmanns West Jordan-borgar.
output: The crash also damaged three homes, West Jordan city spokesperson Tauni Barker said.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Ekki er búið að komast að orsök brotlendingarinnar.
output: The cause of the crash has not been determined.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Málið er til rannsóknar hjá Flugmálastjórn Bandaríkjanna og Rannsóknarstofnun samgönguslysa (NTSB).
output: The FAA and National Transportation Safety Board are investigating.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Gottlieb varar við því að skefjalaus útbreiðsla kórónuveirunnar í samfélagi geri það „mjög erfitt“ að skólar opni í haust
output: Gottlieb warns uncontrolled coronavirus spread in a community makes it "very hard to open" schools in fall

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Washington – Dr. Scott Gottlieb, fyrrum yfirmaður Matvæla- og lyfjaeftirlits Bandaríkjanna, varaði á sunnudaginn við því að það verði „mjög erfitt“ fyrir skólaumdæmi að opna á nýju námsári ef kórónuveiran dreifir sér skefjalaust innan þessara samfélaga.
output: Washington - Dr. Scott Gottlieb, former head of the Food and Drug Administration, warned Sunday it's going to be "very hard" for school districts to open for the upcoming academic year if there is uncontrolled spread of the coronavirus within their communities.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Ég tel að skólayfirvöld þurfi á hverjum stað fyrir sig að skoða hvernig dreifingin er innan samfélagsins.
output: "For local school districts, I think they need to be looking at what is the spread within the community.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Ef veiran dreifist óhindrað í samfélaginu verður mjög erfitt að opna í því ástandi,“ sagði Gottlieb í „Face the Nation“.
output: If you have uncontrolled spread within the community, it's going to be very hard to open against that backdrop." Gottlieb said on "Face the Nation."

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Þar sem haustönn á að hefjast á næstu vikum hafði ríkisstjórn Trump hvatt skólayfirvöld til að opna skóla sína fyrir nemendum og bjóða upp á kennslu í skólunum fimm daga í viku.
output: With the fall semester set to begin in the coming weeks, the Trump administration had been urging school districts to open their doors to students for in-person instruction five days a week.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Þessar tilraunir Trump forseta og menntamálaráðherrans Betsy DeVos koma þó viku eftir að Trump varaði við því að kórónuveirufaraldurinn myndi líklega „versna áður en hann batnar“ og staðfesti að skólaumdæmi á þeim stöðum þar sem ástandið er verst gætu þurft að fresta opnun skóla um nokkrar vikur.
output: But the push from President Trump and Education Secretary Betsy DeVos comes as Mr. Trump warned last week the coronavirus crisis will likely "get worse before it gets better" and acknowledged school districts in hot spots may have to delay reopening for a few weeks.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Engu að síður gáfu sjúkdómsvarnarmiðstöðvar út leiðbeiningar á fimmtudaginn um það hvernig öruggast væri að opna skóla fyrir nemendum.
output: Still, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention issued guidance Thursday for how best to safely open schools for students.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Í leiðbeiningunum er meðal annars kallað eftir því að í skólum sé fjarlægð milli fólks tryggð, nemendum og starfsfólki ráðlagt að nota andlitsvarnir og að nemendum sé skipt í afmarkaða hópa til að fækka smitleiðum.
output: The guidance calls for schools to follow social distancing, recommend students and staff wear face coverings, and keep students in defined groups to reduce contact with others, among other guidelines.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
En sjúkdómsvarnarmiðstöðvarnar gáfu ekki út viðmið fyrir skólastjórnendur um hvenær þeir ættu að loka skólum ef kórónuveirusmitum fer fjölgandi, sem Gottlieb segir hafa verið „óheppilegt“.
output: But the CDC did not provide a benchmark for school administrators on when they should move to close a school in the event of an uptick in coronavirus infections, which Gottlieb said was "unfortunate."

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Þegar þetta óvissuástand ríkir og nákvæmar leiðbeiningar hafa ekki verið gefnar um hvernig skólarnir verða opnaðir held ég að fleiri foreldrar muni fara varlega,“ segir hann.
output: "In the setting of uncertainty and the lack of specific guidance for how to keep schools open, I think more parents are going to err on the side of caution," he said.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Þess vegna tel ég mjög mikilvægt að fá nákvæmar upplýsingar um hverir mælikvarðarnir eru nákvæmlega, sem sjúkdómsvarnarmiðstöðvarnar gáfu ekki í leiðbeiningum sínum.“
output: "That's why it's very important to get specificity out of what the hard metrics are that the CDC didn't do in its guidance."

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Gottlieb sagði skólaumdæmi verða að hugsa um hlutfall jákvæðra smita í samfélaginu, staðbundna útbreiðslu og prófunargetu þegar ákvarðanir eru teknar um hvort halda skuli skólum opnum eða skipta alfarið yfir í kennslu á netinu.
output: Gottlieb said school districts should think about positivity rates in their community, local spread and testing capacity to guide decision-making on whether to keep a school open or shift fully to online learning.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Ef á milli 5 til 10% greininga skila jákvæðri niðurstöðu „fer málið að vandast“ en yfir 10% er „þröskuldurinn þegar íhuga þarf vandlega hvort loka skuli skólaumdæmunum.“
output: A positivity rate between 5% to 10%, he said, is "starting to get iffy," while above 10% is the "threshold where you really want to think carefully about closing the school districts."

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Þetta er merki um að faraldurinn hafi náð fótfestu í samfélaginu,“ sagði Gottlieb og bætti því við að þetta myndi gera hlutum Flórídaríkis, sem er þungamiðja kórónuveirufaraldursins í Bandaríkjunum, erfitt fyrir að opna fyrir kennslu í skólum í næsta mánuði.
output: "That is a sign that there is an epidemic underway inside that community," Gottlieb said, adding that it's going to be difficult for parts of Florida, which is an epicenter of the coronavirus epidemic in the U.S., to open their schools for in-person learning next month.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Kórónuveirusmitum hefur fjölgað í fleiri en 30 ríki og Kólumbíuhéraði en þungamiðja faraldursins er sem stendur í sólarbeltinu svokallaða við suðurströnd Bandaríkjanna.
output: More than 30 states and the District of Columbia are experiencing an uptick in coronavirus infections, with the epicenter of the epidemic currently in the Sun Belt.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Gottlieb sagði þó að merki væru um að það væri byrjað að hægja á fjölgun tilfella í sumum ríkjum, þar á meðal Arizona og Texas.
output: But Gottlieb said there are indications cases in some states including Arizona and Texas are beginning to plateau.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
En þrátt fyrir að Gottlieb hefði sagt að það væru „greinileg merki“ um að það væri farið að hægja á faraldrinum í sumum ríkjum í sólarbeltinu er farið að „hitna í kolunum“ í öðrum, þar á meðal Suður-Karólínu, Alabama, Indíana og Illinois.
output: While Gottlieb said there are "unmistakable signs" the epidemic is slowing in some states across the Sun Belt, it's "heating up" in others, including South Carolina, Alabama, Indiana and Illinois.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Margir ríkisstjórar hafa sett reglur sem skylda fólk til að nota grímur í almenningsrýmum og stöðvað áfangaskipta enduropnun til að sporna við útbreiðslu kórónuveirunnar.
output: Many governors have instituted mandates requiring people to wear masks when they are in public spaces and halted their phased reopenings in an effort to mitigate the spread of the coronavirus.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Gottlieb sagði að ríki ættu að íhuga að loka börum, takmarka fjölda fólks á veitingastöðum, loka kvikmyndahúsum og öðrum stöðum sem bjóða upp á skemmtanir innanhúss og setja reglur um grímunotkun til að sigrast á faraldrinum, sem eru aðgerðir sem gera ríkjum kleift að komast hjá því að taka aftur upp þær ströngu takmarkanir sem settar voru í upphafi faraldursins í mars.
output: Gottlieb said states should consider shutting down bars, limiting the number of people in restaurants, closing movie theaters and other kinds of indoor entertainment venues, and implementing mask mandates to quell the epidemic, steps that allow states to stop short of reverting back to the more stringent restrictions imposed at the start of the pandemic in March.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Auk þess sem ýmis ríki hafa gert grímunotkun að skyldu hafa ýmis fyrirtæki skyldað fólk til að nota andlitsvarnir.
output: In addition to states issuing mask mandates, a number of businesses are requiring customers to wear face coverings as well.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Skyndibitarisinn McDonald's er nýjasta fyrirtækið til að gera notkun andlitsvarna að skyldu og bætist því í hóp fyrirtækja eins og Walmart, Starbucks og fleiri sem hafa sett eigin reglur um grímunotkun.
output: McDonald's is among the latest to require face coverings, and the fast food giant joins Walmart, Starbucks and others in implementing their own rules for masks.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Gottlieb sagði að hann gerði ráð fyrir því að fleiri fyrirtæki myndu taka upp grímuskyldu hjá sér, sérstaklega þar sem hættan er talin mikil.
output: Gottlieb said he expects more businesses will implement mask mandates in venues, especially those considered high-risk.

instruction:

output: One of these projects is a collaboration with the Icelandic Institute of Natural History and involves collecting castor bean ticks from birds.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:

instruction:

instruction:

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
En nóg um mítla.
output: But enough about ticks.

instruction:

output: When asked how the birds of South-East Iceland are doing this summer, Brynjúlfur replies that the arctic tern's egg-laying seems to be going well — where it lays eggs at all.

instruction:

instruction:

output: There are no nesting grounds at Jökulsárlón anymore, however, where there were huge nesting grounds several years ago."

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:

output: He says that a few years ago, more than a thousand arctic tern pairs laid eggs there, but now they can be counted on one hand.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:

output: "When we look at moorland birds and shorebirds, it seems like you find fewer of them in the last few years.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
En það er auðvitað alltaf breyting á milli ára.“
output: But of course there's always variation from one year to another."

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Það sem geti skýrt þá miklu breytingu snýst að sögn Brynjólfs líklegast um framboð á æti.
output: Brynjúlfur thinks that this great shift is probably due to food supply.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Þetta snýst jú allt um mat.“
output: "Everything revolves around food, of course."

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Þá geti mannanna verk einnig haft sitt að segja um afkomu fugla og annarra dýra.
output: He says that human activity could also have an effect on the survival of birds and other animals.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
En sumir fuglar virðast hafa það býsna gott á Suðausturlandi þetta sumarið.
output: But some birds seem to be doing rather well in South-East Iceland this summer.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:

output: "One positive thing I've found is that the number of arctic skuas is increasing again after a great lull," says Brynjólfur, "but meanwhile, the great skua has suffered terrible decline in the last years and decades."

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Af spörfuglum er það að frétta að svo virðist sem maríuerlunni ætli að ganga vel í sínu varpi í sumar líkt og í fyrra.
output: As for passerine birds, it seems like the white wagtail should do well in its egg-laying this summer, like it did last year.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:

output: There are somewhat fewer redwings and meadow pipits, but Brynjúlfur says that it won't become clear until next autumn how the summer turned out for them.

instruction:

En snúum okkur að flækingunum.
output: But let's talk about the stray birds.

instruction:

output: They often cause quite a bit of stir, particularly if they are very rare or perhaps colourful.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Þessir tveir athyglisverðu þættir eiga um einn vinsælasta flæking sumarsins: Rósarstarann.
output: These two interesting factors apply to one of the summer's most popular strays: the common wood pigeon.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:

output: "But this summer has actually been relatively quiet when it comes to strays," says Brynjúlfur, but notes that a common crane can now be found in the area, and that common wood pigeons have been spotted and are beginning to nest here.

instruction:

output: When Brynjúlfur and Björn come into contact with strays, they tag them just like other birds.

instruction:

output: The tags are international and used all over the world.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:

output: Tagging can provide various information, e.g. about the birds' winter location, where they nest and their migration routes.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Það er jafnvel hægt að sjá hvað þeir eru lengi á farflugi,“ bendir Brynjúlfur á.

instruction:

output: This information is useful in many respects, for instance when it comes to epidemics such as bird flus.

instruction:

„Það er alltaf verið að auka þekkinguna.“
output: "Our knowledge is constantly being expanded."

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:

output: If someone abroad finds a bird tagged by the South East Iceland Birds Observatory, the information is sent to the Icelandic Institute of Natural History.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Við höfum fengið endurheimtur allt frá Höfðaborg í Suður-Afríku.
output: "We have had recoveries all the way in Cape Town, South Africa.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Þar fannst kría sem við höfðum merkt.

instruction:

Ein kría frá okkur fannst síðar í Bandaríkjunum.“
output: One of our arctic terns was later found in the United States."

instruction:

output: One bird is particularly close to Brynjúlfur's heart: the great skua.

instruction:

output: "The great skua is our bird," he says, pointing out that the South East Iceland Birds Observatory and the South East Iceland Nature Research Centre have the task of monitoring its survival status — which has become rather poor, placing it on the watch list.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:

output: It's hard to say with any certainty what caused the population drop but according to one theory, the great skua used to benefit from the catch thrown into the sea from fishing vessels, with a corresponding effect on the population now that the catch is utilised much more extensively.

instruction:

instruction:

output: "You obviously can't get me to say no," says Brynjólfur with a laugh, adding: "We're also chasing strays so we have to go to more places."

instruction:

output: It's very interesting to be here and observe migratory birds and strays but there are fewer nesting birds here than in many other parts of the country.

instruction:

output: Then it's always good to find birds that have never or rarely been seen before in Iceland, not to mention finding a new species for Europe."

output: You can look at Binni and Bjössi's work on Facebook and the website Fuglar.is to follow their work with the South East Iceland Birds Observatory more closely.

output: Francois Bozize, deposed CAR leader, announces presidential bid

output: Deposed former Central African Republic President Francois Bozize announced on Saturday his candidacy for the December presidential vote despite being under United Nations sanctions and subject to an arrest warrant for alleged crimes against humanity.

instruction:

output: He made the announcement in a speech to a large crowd of supporters at a congress of his party, Kwa na Kwa (Work, Nothing But Work), in the capital Bangui.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:

output: The 73-year-old former general and army chief was overthrown in a 2013 rebellion by a coalition of mainly Muslim rebels from the north, plunging the majority Christian nation into a violent civil war and an acute and continuing humanitarian crisis.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:

output: "The country needs a man of experience, peace and conviction," Bozize said in the speech that criticised the tenure of the current president, Faustin-Archange Touadera.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:

output: Bozize first took power after a 2003 coup and served 10 years as president before fleeing the country in 2013.

instruction:

Nýja ríkisstjórnin leitaðist við að handtaka hann fyrir meinta glæpi gegn mannkyni og fyrir að hvetja til þjóðarmorðs en hann hefur ekki verið handtekinn frá því að hann sneri aftur úr útlegð síðla síðasta árs.
output: The new administration sought his arrest for alleged crimes against humanity and incitement to genocide, but has not moved to arrest him since he returned from exile late last year.

output: It is not clear how the warrant or foreign sanctions will affect his candidacy.

instruction:

output: In January, Bozize said he would ask the UN to lift the sanctions imposed in 2014 over his alleged support for Anti-balaka Christian armed groups.

instruction:

output: Touadera governs today with the support of a large UN peacekeeping operation with more than 13,000 troops and police.

output: The government signed a peace deal in February 2019 with 14 armed groups, who typically claim to defend the interests of specific communities or religions.

instruction:

output: Violence has since generally receded, but there are still bloody incidents, typically sparked by fighting over resources and most of the diamond-rich country remains beyond government control.

output: Gareth Bale's situation at Real Madrid is 'unsatisfactory for everyone', says Toni Kroos

output: Bale did not feature in any of the last seven games and was a peripheral figure in Los Blancos' LaLiga celebrations ahead of a summer stand-off as the player looks to stay and see out his contract and the club hope he will leave.

output: "There is no way to avoid the situation being unsatisfactory for everyone," Kroos told the Lauschangriff Endlich was mit Sport! podcast.

instruction:

instruction:

instruction:

output: "Everything is good with the team.  I have known him for six years and we have won some important things together."

instruction:

instruction:

instruction:

output: According to Víkurfréttir, they discussed strengthening the twin town relationship, established in 2014, between the municipalities of Reykjanesbær and Xianyang.

output: The gift, 2,000 face masks, can be traced to this twin town relationship, as city authorities in Xianyang wished to donate masks to support the fight against the coronavirus pandemic.

instruction:

output: Víkurfréttir's report states that the masks will be used in vulnerable institutions and establishment in Reykjanesbær, both for staff and visitors.

output: The accompanying photo shows the flags of Iceland and China and an inscription on the face mask box reading "Bare is back without brother behind it".

instruction:

output: Thomsen wants to leave KR - expects a salary cut

instruction:

output: Tobias Thomsen will attempt to go home to Denmark and leave Icelandic champions KR next month, and says that he senses interest from members of the Danish 1st Division.

output: Thomsen has played in Iceland since 2017 and been Icelandic champion with both Valur and KR.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:

output: But now the 27-year old striker says that he's beginning to miss Denmark and wants to move there with his girlfriend, Stefanía Jakobsdóttir.

instruction:

output: The term of the Danish player's contract with KR is until the end of this season so it is clear that a Danish club would have to negotiate a transfer fee with KR to get him in August, before the next Danish season begins.

instruction:

output: Otherwise, Thomsen would have to wait until winter to get to Denmark.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Já, ég veit að dönsku deildirnar byrja aftur í lok ágúst.
output: "Yes, I know that the Danish leagues start again in late August.

instruction:

output: Of course, that means that I would have to terminate my contract with KR, but I have told them that I miss Denmark and they have full understanding of that," said Thomsen in an interview with bold.dk.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Hann bætti við að hann ætti í mjög góðu sambandi við Rúnar Kristinsson þjálfara, sem hefði sýnt stöðunni fullan skilning, og Thomsen sagðist ekki telja að kaupverðið yrði mikið vandamál.
output: He added that he had a very good relationship with manager Rúnar Kristinsson, who understood the situation completely, and Thomsen said that he did not believe that the transfer fee would be much of a problem.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Ég hef líka átt samtöl við tvö 1. deildarfélög eftir að sú deild var að klárast og liðin vissu hvar þau myndu enda.
output: "I also had discussions with two 1st Division teams when the league was winding down and the teams knew where they would end up.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Það hefur verið svolítill áhugi nú þegar varðandi komandi tímabil svo það getur vel verið að ég fari til Danmerkur áður en að íslenska deildin hættir,“ sagði Thomsen en bætti við að ljóst væri að ekki væru mörg félög í Danmörku sem gætu keypt upp samning hans við KR.
output: There has already been some interest regarding the upcoming season, so I could very possibly go to Denmark before the Icelandic league is finished," said Thomsen, while adding that there weren't many Danish teams that could buy up his contract with KR.

instruction:

„Þetta er ekki alveg ljóst núna en það hefur verið áhugi.
output: "It's not completely clear now, but there has been interest.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Ég þarf líka að finna besta möguleikann fyrir mig og mína kærustu, sem er frá Íslandi og kemur með mér.
output: I also have to find the best option for me and my girlfriend, who is Icelandic and will come with me.

instruction:

Þetta veltur á nokkrum hlutum,“ sagði Thomsen og kvaðst horfa fyrst og fremst til Kaupmannahafnar.
output: It depends on several things," said Thomsen and added that he was mainly considering Copenhagen.

instruction:

output: "KR knows what it's getting from me, which is 100 percent in everything I do.

output: I can always disregard the fact that I miss Denmark when I'm training or playing matches," said Thomsen, adding that leaving the Icelandic champions to join Denmark's second highest league would obviously mean a cut in his salary.

instruction:

„Ég mun sennilega þurfa að lækka aðeins í launum, út af kórónuveirukrísunni sem virðist hafa hrellt dönsku félögin aðeins meira en þau íslensku.
output: "I would probably have to take a little salary cut because of the coronavirus crisis, which seems to have had a rather bigger effect on the Danish clubs than the Icelandic ones.

En ég er líka í námi og ein lausn gæti verið að félag útvegaði mér vinnu.
output: But I'm also a student and one solution could be for the club to provide me with a job.

instruction:

Flest félögin í 1. deild eru jú með samkomulag við styrktaraðila.

instruction:

Ég er að læra íþróttastjórnun í gegnum leikmannasamtökin og er að klára bachelor-gráðuna,“ sagði Thomsen.
output: I'm studying sports management through the players' association and finishing a BA degree," said Thomsen.

Thomsen hefur aðeins verið í byrjunarliði KR í tveimur leikjum í Pepsi Max-deildinni á þessari leiktíð, en komið við sögu í fimm leikjum og skorað eitt mark.
output: Thomsen has only twice been a member of KR's starting lineup in the Pepsi Max League this season, but he has been involved in five matches and scored one goal.

output: Last season, he started 21 times for the team and scored seven goals.

instruction:

output: Coronavirus row breaks out on bus as driver gets in fiery exchange over face masks

output: The bus driver said: "It's not my job to ask everyone who comes on the bus about wearing a mask."

„Bílstjórinn þurfti að fara úr sæti sínu og kom til að spyrja hvað væri eiginlega í gangi og hann sagði einni konu að hún væri ekki einu sinni að nota grímuna rétt.“
output: "The bus driver had to get out of his seat and came over to demand what was going on and he told one woman she wasn't even wearing her mask properly."

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Sú kona rauk síðan á brott úr vagninum og sagðist ætla að tilkynna atvikið.“
output: "That woman then stormed off the bus and said she was going to report the incident."

instruction:

Talsmaður Arriva sagði: „Öryggi viðskiptavina og starfsmanna okkar er sem fyrr í forgangi hjá okkur.
output: A spokesperson for Arriva said: "The safety of our customers and employees continues to be our priority.

„Viðskiptavinum okkar er sem fyrr skylt að nota grímur þegar þeir nota almenningssamgöngur (undantekningar eiga við).“

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Skýrar leiðbeiningar og merkingar fyrir viðskiptavini varðandi þetta og allar aðrar fjarlægðarreglur eru um borð í strætisvögnum, á samfélagsmiðlum og á vefsvæði okkar.“
output: "We have clear guidance and signage for customers in regards to this and all other social distancing measures in place on bus, via social media and our website."

instruction:

Grímuskylda hefur verið í gildi í almenningssamgöngum síðan 15. júní.
output: It has been mandatory to wear a face covering when using public transport since June 15.

instruction:

Meira en 16,3 tilfelli af COVID-19 hafa greinst á heimsvísu.

Fleiri en 650,000 hafa látist.

Flest tilfelli af COVID-19 hafa greinst í Bandaríkjunum, eða fleiri en 4,3 milljónir.

instruction:

Octavia Spencer kallar eftir því að Hollywood ráði fólk með fötlun oftar í hlutverk
output: Octavia Spencer calls on Hollywood to increase casting of people with disabilities

instruction:

Leikkonan tekur þátt í nýju átaki um aukna þátttöku fólks með fötlun í afþreyingargeiranum.
output: The actress is part of a new PSA that calls for increased inclusion of those with disabilities in entertainment.

instruction:

output: The campaign coincides with Sunday's 30th anniversary of the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA).

instruction:

output: The video shows Spencer discussing the importance of everyone being able to see themselves and their lives accurately reflected on screen.

instruction:

„Ekkert getur komið í stað persónulegrar reynslu og ósvikinna birtingarmynda,“ segir hún.
output: "Nothing can replace lived experience and authentic representation," she said.

instruction:

„Þess vegna skiptir svo miklu máli að ráða viðeigandi leikara í viðeigandi hlutverk.“
output: "That's why it's imperative that we cast the appropriate actor for the appropriate role."

instruction:

Spencer ræddi þau áhrif sem hún varð fyrir af því að sjá hörundsdökkt fólk á skjánum þegar hún var lítil stelpa að horfa á þáttinn „Good Times“.
output: Spencer discussed the impact she felt seeing a family of color on screen as a young girl watching the show "Good Times."

instruction:

Þættirnir, sem voru sýndir á CBS á árunum 1974 til 1979, voru búnir til af Norman Lear og þeir ruddu veginn sem fyrstu grínþættirnir sem sýndu tvo foreldra sem báðir voru af afrískum uppruna.
output: The series, which ran on CBS from 1974 to 1979, was created by Norman Lear and broke barriers as television's first African American two-parent family sitcom.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Samtök gegn hungri ýta Yoho til hliðar eftir atvik í þinghúsinu
output: Hunger organization pushes out Yoho after Capitol incident

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
WASHINGTON (AP) – Óháð kristin samtök sem vilja binda enda á hungur sögðu á laugardaginn að þau hefðu beiðið þingmanninn Ted Yoho um að segja sig úr stjórn samtakanna, og að hann hefði orðið við því, eftir það sem þau kölluðu „árás“ á þingmanninn Alexandriu Ocasio-Cortez.
output: WASHINGTON (AP) - A nonpartisan Christian organization that seeks to end hunger said Saturday it asked for and received the resignation of Rep. Ted Yoho from its board of directors following what it called his "verbal attack" on Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Ocasio-Cortez, þingmaður Demókrata í New York, sakaði Yoho, þingmann Repúblikana í Flórída, um að nota lágkúruleg og karlrembuleg hrakyrði er hann ávítaði hana þegar þau mættust á tröppum þinghússins síðastliðinn mánudag.
output: Ocasio-Cortez, D-N.Y., accused Yoho, R-Fla., of using a vulgar and sexist insult while upbraiding her during a confrontation last Monday on the steps of the Capitol.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Yoho hélt því fram að hann hefði ekki notað þau orð sem vitnað var til en fréttamaður sem varð vitni að atvikinu staðfesti að orðalagið hefði verið eins og hún lýsti því.
output: Yoho maintained he did not use the words cited, though a reporter who witnessed the incident confirmed the language as she described it.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Bread for the World sagði í yfirlýsingu að stjórn samtakanna hefði hitt Yoho á föstudaginn og sóst eftir því að hann segði af sér til að „árétta skuldbindingu okkar um að standa með konum og hörundsdökku fólki, innanlands og á heimsvísu, sem leiða okkur í átt að heimi með aukinni þátttöku allra kynþátta og auknu réttlæti.“
output: In a statement, Bread for the World said its board met Friday with Yoho and sought his resignation "as an action that reaffirms our commitment to coming alongside women and people of color, nationally and globally, as they continue to lead us to a more racially inclusive and equitable world."

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Á vefsíðu Bread for the World segir að „samkristin rödd“ þeirra þrýsti á þingið og stjórnvöld um að binda enda á hungur í landinu og á heimsvísu.
output: On its website, Bread for the World says its "collective Christian voice" lobbies Congress and the administration on ending hunger nationally and worldwide.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Þar sem Bread for the World eru óháð kristin samtök sem hafa það markmið að minnka hungur og fátækt með traustum opinberum stefnum halda samtökin á lofti þeirri virðingu, reisn og umhyggju sem Jesús biður okkur um að sýna þegar við eigum í samskiptum við fólk í valdastöðum, hvar sem það er á hinu pólitíska litrófi,“ segir í yfirlýsingunni.
output: "As a bipartisan Christian organization committed to alleviating hunger and poverty through sound public policies, Bread for the World upholds the values of respect, dignity, and compassion that Jesus calls us to when engaging decision makers from across the political spectrum," the statement said.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Að okkar mati endurspegla nýlegar athafnir og orð þingmannsins Ted Yoho, sem greint var frá í fjölmiðlum, ekki þær siðferðiskröfur sem gerðar eru til stjórnarmeðlima okkar.“
output: "We believe that Rep. Ted Yoho's recent actions and words as reported in the media are not reflective of the ethical standards expected of members of our Board of Directors."

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Við vinnslu fréttarinnar hafði talsmaður Yoho ekki svarað tölvupósti með boði um bregðast við.
output: A spokesman for Yoho did not immediately respond to an email seeking comment.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Í ótrúlegri ræðu í þinghúsinu síðastliðinn fimmtudag sagði Ocasio-Cortez á dramatískan hátt frá atvikinu og beindi orðum sínum gegn því sem hún kallaði karlrembumenningu sem „samþykkir ofbeldi og ofbeldisfullt orðbragð gegn konum“.
output: In an extraordinary speech Thursday in the House, Ocasio-Cortez offered a dramatic account of the incident and broadened her remarks to assail what she called a sexist culture of "accepting violence and violent language against women."

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Meira en tugur samstarfsmanna hennar tók undir orð hennar um að atvikið væri dæmi um allt of algenga hegðun karla.
output: More than a dozen colleagues joined her in casting the incident as all-too-common male behavior.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Yoho lýsti atvikinu sem stuttum umræðum um stefnumál og að „enginn hefði verið angraður, lagður í einelti eða orðið fyrir árás“.
output: Yoho has described the encounter as a brief policy discussion and said that "no one was accosted, bullied, or attacked."

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Hann sagðist sjá eftir því að hafa sýnt „höstuglegt viðmót“.
output: He expressed regret for his "abrupt manner."

output: Judge denies attempt to stop order requiring release of children in immigration custody

instruction:

output: In a Saturday ruling, Judge Dolly Gee appeared to make the upcoming deadline moot by saying that US Immigration and Customs Enforcement doesn't have to release children if the three ways outlined in her previous order can't be met.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:

output: But Gee also underscored in her order that ICE still has a duty to release children in a timely manner.

instruction:

output: The three ways Gee had outlined included releasing families who are in ICE detention together, releasing children to a sponsor, or releasing families based upon a federal court order.

instruction:

output: Shalyn Fluharty, director of Proyecto Dilley, an organization that offers legal services to families in detention, decried the move as allowing ICE to decide whether to continue keeping children detained.

instruction:

output: "The bottom line for me is that kids are detained indefinitely and they have no way out unless ICE agrees to do it or families agree to be separated," Fluharty said.

output: Families are detained in three facilities run by ICE -- Berks in Pennsylvania, South Texas (Dilley) and Karnes County in Texas.

output: Children at the facilities range from ages 1 to 17, according to lawyers and advocates who provide legal assistance.

output: Gee -- who oversees implementation of the Flores Agreement, which governs care of children in custody -- said in June that given "non-compliance or spotty compliance with masking and social distancing rules," it was imperative to transfer children out of the facilities.

output: There are 969 detainees in ICE custody with positive coronavirus cases who are under isolation or monitoring as of July 23, according to ICE.

output: The Central Bank Governor's comments on the need to ensure the independence of Board members of pension funds, possibly by law, will be taken under consideration.

instruction:

output: When Icelandair ceased negotiating with the Icelandic Cabin Crew Association and laid off all airline hostesses, the Board of VR declared that VR-appointed members of the Board of the Pension Fund of Commerce would boycott or vote against the pension fund's participation in Icelandair's upcoming stock offering.

instruction:

output: Central Bank Governor Ásgeir Jónsson said to RÚV News on Friday that the independence of pension fund Board members in the funds' decisions had to be ensured, possibly with a legal amendment.

instruction:

output: Prime Minister Katrín Jakobsdóttir says that the independence of pension fund Board members is important but believes that it is already ensured by law.

instruction:

output: "Now the Central Bank Governor, who is of course the head of the Financial Conduct Authority, under whose authority this is, says that the regulatory environment around this independence should be examined specifically, and we will of course take this under consideration if there is anything that has to be reviewed," she says.

output: "I would also not consider it unnatural for pension funds to establish criteria on workers' rights in their investment policy.

instruction:

output: But I think it's natural for such decisions to be made through policy development rather than individual investment decisions," says Katrín.

Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:

output: As Icelanders embark on travels across their country, with heavy traffic on the country's highways, a traffic jam is created by the Ölfus Bridge every day as drivers try to reach Selfoss or drive through the municipality.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Langar raðir myndast við brúnna og getur tekið á þolinmæði ökumanna að bíða í röð.
output: Long lines are created by the bridge and waiting in line can test the patience of drivers.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Já, það er algjörlega óþolandi, þetta er ein umferðarteppa hérna og ekki bara á föstudögum því þetta er bara orðið á virkum dögum líka.
output: "Yes, it's completely intolerable. This is one big traffic jam here, and not only on Fridays because now it's also on working days.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Það eru langar biðraðir, stundum alveg upp á Hellisheiði fyrir þá sem vilja komast hér hjá á leið sinni austur á land og þeir sem eru að koma í vesturátt, þannig að það gefur auga leið að við þurfum að fá nýja brú og eigi síðar en í gær helst,“ segir Helgi S. Haraldsson, forseti bæjarstjórnar í Árborg.
output: There are long lines, sometimes extending to Hellisheiði, for those who want to pass through here on their way to the east of the country and those who are heading west, so it's obvious that we need a new bridge, preferably no later than yesterday," says Árborg's Municipal Council President, Helgi S. Haraldsson.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Helgi segir að bæjaryfirvöld í Árborg hafi nýlega átt fund með forstjóra Vegagerðarinnar og hönnuði Vegagerðarinnar og sá fundur hafi verið mjög jákvæður.
output: Helgi says that municipal authorities in Árborg recently had a very positive meeting with the head of the Icelandic Road and Coastal Administration and one of its designers.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Ef maður hefur einhvern tímann verið bjartsýnn á að það sé verið að vinna í þessum málum þá held ég að ég geti sagt það núna því að það er virkilega verið að vinna í þessu og við eigum að geta séð að ný brú verði boðið út í haust.“
output: "I think it's safe to say that there is more reason to be optimistic about work being done on this than ever before, because there's really something being done, and we should see a tender invitation for a new bridge next autumn."

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
En á Helgi einhver ráð til þeirra ökumanna, sem eru í biðröðinni við Ölfusárbrú alla daga yfir sumartímann?
output: But has Helgi any advice to the drivers stuck in the line at Ölfusá Bridge every day of the summer?

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Já, að er hægt að fara þrengslin og í gegnum Eyrarbakka, það flýtir fyrir en þeir sem eru að fara austur á bóginn, það er ekki hægt að benda þeim á að fara Lyngdalsheiðina en þeir sem eru að fara í uppsveitirnar ættu að nota Mosfellsheiði, Þingvelli og Lyngdalsheiði“.
output: "Yes, you can drive across Þrengsli and through Eyrarbakki to be quicker, but those who are heading east cannot be told to cross Lyngdalsheiði, while those who are heading upcountry should use Mosfellsheiði, Þingvellir and Lyngdalsheiði."

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Helgi S. Haraldsson, forseti bæjarstjórnar Árborgar, sem segir umferðarteppunnar, sem myndast við Ölfusárbrú við Selfoss óþolandi.
output: Árborg's Municipal Council President, Helgi S. Haraldsson, who calls the traffic jams at Ölfusá Bridge outside Selfoss intolerable.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Langar biðraðir myndast á hverjum degi við Ölfusárbrú og þurfa ökumenn oft að bíða í töluverðan tíma til að komast yfir brúnna.
output: There are long lines at Ölfusá Bridge every day, with drivers often having to wait for some time before crossing the bridge.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Þá er eina ráðið að draga andann djúpt og hugsa eitthvað jákvætt.
output: In that case, the only thing to do is to draw a deep breath and think positive thoughts.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Framtíð heimkynna kóalabjarna í norðurhluta Brisbane fer fyrir skipulagsdóm
output: Future of north Brisbane koala habitat site goes to planning court

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Borgarstjórn sagði að auk þess sem svæðið væri lífsnauðsynleg heimkynni kóalabjarna, svifíkorna og hins gráa gáshauks væri það mikilvægur hlekkur milli náttúrusvæðanna Cabbage Tree Creek og Albany Creek.
output: The council said as well as being critical koala, squirrel glider and grey goshawk habitat, it was a key link between Cabbage Tree Creek and Albany Creek bushland corridors.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Framkvæmdaraðilar hafa áfrýjað höfnun borgarstjórnar til dómstóls skipulags- og umhverfismála með þeim rökum að uppbyggingin sé í samræmi við lög um borgarskipulag frá árinu 2014, myndi uppfylla skipulags- og samfélagsþörf sem ekki hefur verið uppfyllt til þessa og „gæti farið fram án óviðunandi áhrifa“.
output: The property developers have appealed the council's rejection in the Planning and Environment Court, arguing the development complies with City Plan 2014 legislation, would satisfy an unmet town planning and community need and could "be undertaken without any unacceptable impacts."

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Mikil andstaða ríkir um þessar fyrirhuguðu framkvæmdir í nærumhverfinu.
output: Strong community opposition persists over the proposed development.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Framkvæmdaraðilarnir halda því fram að þrátt fyrir að tillagan sé að fullu í samræmi við skipulagið væri hægt að breyta henni ef hún uppfyllir ekki kröfur, fremur en að hafna henni.
output: The developers, while maintaing the proposal is fully compliant with the plan, argue it could be changed to avoid any non-compliance rather than refused.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Eins og er felur framkvæmdin í sér mörg stig, meðal annars þjónustustöð, barnagæslu og 39 íbúðarhús.
output: The development as it stands involves several stages, including a service station, childcare centre and 39 townhouses.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Opinberar innsendingar voru fleiri en 120 á samráðstíma og flestar mótmæltu þær tillögunni þar sem hún væri of stór og óviðeigandi fyrir svæðið.
output: More than 120 public submissions were made during the consultation period, most objecting to the proposal as too big and inappropriate for the site.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Leiðtogi minnihlutans í borgarstjórn Brisbane sagði að borgin þyrfti að kaupa landið til að vernda kóalabirnina.
output: BCC opposition leader Jared Cassidy said the council needed to buy the land to protect koalas.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„[Borgarstjórinn] Adrian Schrinner þarf að hætta að sóa sjóðum skattgreiðenda í baráttu við framkvæmdaraðila fyrir dómi og kaupa þetta land til að vernda náttúru- og dýralíf Brisbane,“ sagði borgarfulltrúinn Cassidy.
output: "[Lord mayor] Adrian Schrinner needs to stop wasting ratepayer funds in a developer court battle and buy this land to protect Brisbane's wildlife," Cr Cassidy said.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Þetta eru ein mikilvægustu heimkynni kóalabjarna á náttúrusvæðinu Mountain to Mangroves og þar er fjöldi kóalabjarna.“
output: "This is one of the most significant pieces of habitat in the Mountain to Mangroves Corridor and is home to a large koala community."

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Schrinner sagði í vikunni að borgarstjórn vildi að heimkynni kóalabjarna á svæðinu yrðu varin.
output: Cr Schrinner this week said the council wanted to see the koala habitat on the site protected.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Okkur fannst tillagan ekki henta fyrir svæðið,“ sagði Schrinner.
output: "We didn't believe the proposal was appropriate for the site," Cr Schrinner said.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Mér skilst að þetta fari nú í gegnum dómskerfið og augljóslega vonumst við til þess að það leiði af sér góða og jákvæða útkomu sem verður til þess að heimkynnin varðveitast.“
output: "This, I understand, is now going through a court process and obviously we hope to see out of that court process a good, positive outcome which will see the habitat preserved."

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Schrinner sagði að kortlagning á heimkynnum kóalabjarna væri sameiginleg ábyrgð borgarstjórnar og ríkisstjórnar, en að ríkisstjórnin bæri ábyrgð á nákvæmum kortum yfir heimkynni kóalabjarna sem staðbundin yfirvöld styðjast við þegar þau taka umsóknir um framkvæmdir til meðferðar.
output: Cr Schrinner said koala habitat mapping was a joint responsibility between the council and the state government, with the state government responsible for detailed koala mapping used by local authorities for assessing development applications.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Solskjær: Næsta skref er að vinna eitthvað
output: Solskjær: The next step is winning something

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Ole Gunnar Solskjær, þjálfari Man Utd, var að vonum kampakátur með að liðið hafi tryggt sér þriðja sæti í ensku úrvalsdeildinni í dag.
output: Man Utd manager Ole Gunnar Solskjær was understandably very happy with the team securing a third-place position in the Premier League today.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Liðið mun því leika í Meistaradeild Evrópu á næsta tímabili.
output: This means that the team will play in the UEFA Champions League next season.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
United þurfti jafntefli eða sigur gegn Leicester í dag og var niðurstaðan 2–0 sigur Rauðu djöflanna.
output: United needed a draw or win against Leicester today, and the result was a 2-0 victory for the Red Devils.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Frábært afrek hjá leikmönnunum að ná þriðja sæti miðað við hvernig staðan hefur verið á tímabilinu.
output: "Reaching third place was a great achievement for the players considering how the situation has been during the season.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Ég held að við stákarnir hafi mögulega komist yfir andlegan hjalla með því að vinna svona stórleik, þar sem við höfum tapað tvisvar í undanúrslitum á þessu tímabili.
output: I think that me and the boys may have overcome a mental block by winning such a big game, considering our two semi-final losses this season.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Við vissum að við þyrftum úrslit í dag, núna getum við hafið næsta kafla sem er hjá þessum strákum að vinna titla,“ sagði Solskjær sigurreifur.
output: We knew that we needed good results today, and now we can begin our next chapter which for these boys means winning titles," added Solskjær, pleased with the victory.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Manchester United á enn möguleika á að vinna titil á þessu tímabili, en liðið leikur í Evrópudeildinni í ágúst og er svo gott sem komið í 8—liða úrslit þar.
output: Manchester United still has a chance to win a title this season, as the team plays in the Europa League in August and has practically secured a spot in the quarter-final.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Vopnahlé hefst á miðnætti í stríðshrjáðri Austur-Úkraínu
output: Cease-fire in war-torn eastern Ukraine to begin at midnight

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Kíev, Úkraínu – Úkraínski herinn og andspyrnuöfl í austurhluta Úkraínu undirbúa nú „algjört“ vopnahlé sem á að hefjast á miðnætti og sem fulltrúar vonast til að geti verið fyrsta skrefið í átt að friði eftir átök í 6 ár.
output: KYIV, Ukraine -- Ukrainian and rebel forces in war-torn eastern Ukraine have started preparing for a "full and comprehensive" cease-fire scheduled to begin at midnight, a move that officials hope can lead to more steps to resolve the 6-year-old conflict.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Fulltrúar andspyrnuafla sögðu á sunnudag að þeir hefðu gefið hermönnum sínum fyrirmæli um vopnahlé og gefið út tilskipun um bann við notkun vopna.
output: Rebel officials said Sunday they have instructed their troops about the cease-fire and issued a decree banning the use of weapons.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Úkraínuher sagði sinn herafla hafa „hafið undirbúning“ fyrir vopnahléið.
output: Ukraine's military said their forces "have begun preparations" for the ceasefire.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Ef það nær fram að ganga myndi það „greiða leiðina fyrir framkvæmd annarra ákvæða“ Minsk-friðarsamkomulagsins samkvæmt yfirlýsingu skrifstofu forseta Úkraínu fyrr í vikunni þar sem vopnahléið var kallað tímamótaskref.
output: If upheld, it would "pave the way for implementing other clauses" of the Minsk peace deal, the office of Ukraine's president said earlier this week, calling the cease-fire a "breakthrough."

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Markmið Minsk-friðarsamkomulagsins, sem gert var árið 2015 fyrir tilstilli Frakklands og Þýskalands, var að leysa úr átökunum milli Úkraínu og aðskilnaðarsinna sem njóta fulltingis Rússlands, en þau átök hófust árið 2014 eftir innlimun Rússlands á Krímskaganum og stuðning landsins við aðskilnaðarsinna.
output: Brokered in 2015 by France and Germany, the Minsk peace plan aimed to resolve the conflict between Ukraine and Russia-backed separatists that flared in 2014 after Russia's annexation of Crimea and its support for the separatists.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Meira en 14.000 manns hafa látist í átökunum.
output: The conflict has since killed more than 14,000.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Forsetar Rússlands og Úkraínu fögnuðu báðir vopnahléinu í símtali á sunnudaginn og lögðu áherslu á mikilvægi þess að koma samkomulaginu sem náðist á fundinum í París í desember í framkvæmd.
output: The presidents of Russia and Ukraine both commended the cease-fire deal in a phone call Sunday and underscored the importance of implementing the agreements reached at the December summit in Paris.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Vladimír Pútín, Rússlandsforseti, lét í ljós áhyggjur af ákalli Kíev um að Minks-samkomulagið skyldi endurskoðað og sagði að afstaða Volodimírs Selenskij, Úkraínuforseta, um „óbreytanleika Minsk-samkomulagsins, sem hann lét enn á ný í ljós í þessu símtali, ætti að endurspeglast í raunverulegum aðgerðum“.
output: Russia President Vladimir Putin expressed concern over Kyiv's calls to revise the Minsk agreements and said Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy's "position about the non-alternative nature of the Minsk agreements, once again voiced during this call, should translate into real actions," the Kremlin said.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Selenskij lagði hins vegar áherslu á nauðsyn þess að grípa til „frekari aðgerða“ til að frelsa þá Úkraínumenn sem eru fangar uppreisnarmanna í Austur-Úkraínu, á hinum innlimaða Krímskaga og í Rússlandi, samkvæmt yfirlýsingu frá skrifstofu forsetans.
output: Zelenskiy in turn, stressed the need "for further practical steps" aimed at releasing Ukrainians who are imprisoned by rebels in eastern Ukraine, in the annexed region of Crimea and in Russia, according to a statement by his office.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Samkvæmt samkomulaginu frá árinu 2015 getur Úkraína aðeins fengið yfirráð yfir landamærum við Rússland á þeim svæðum sem aðskilnaðarsinnar hafa á valdi sínu þegar þau hafa fengið víðtækan sjálfstjórnarrétt og þegar kosningar hafa verið haldnar á svæðunum.
output: The 2015 deal envisaged that Ukraine can regain control over its border with Russia in the separatist-held regions only after they are granted broad self-rule and hold local elections.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Samkomulagið dró úr átökum en Úkraínuher og uppreisnarmenn hafa áfram skipst á skotum.
output: The accord helped reduce the scope of hostilities, but Ukrainian forces and the rebels have continued to exchange artillery salvos and gunfire.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Þegar leiðtogar Úkraínu, Rússlands, Frakklands og Þýskalands hittust í París í desember til að eiga aðrar viðræður var látinn í ljós stuðningur við Minsk-samkomulagið og samþykkt að hefja friðarferlið á ný.
output: In December, the leaders of Ukraine, Russia, France and Germany met in Paris for another round of talks, expressing support for the Minsk deal and agreeing to revive the peace process.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Selenskij, sem vann kosningarnar árið 2019 með loforðum um að binda enda á átökin, vildi að Úkraína fengi yfirráð yfir landamærunum fyrir fyrstu svæðiskosningarnar en stjórnvöld í Kreml krefjast þess að samningurinn verði tekinn til framkvæmda án breytinga.
output: Zelenskiy, who won the 2019 election on promises to end the conflict, wanted Ukraine to get control of its border first before local elections, but the Kremlin has insisted the deal should be implemented without revisions.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Nýja vopnahléssamkomulagið náðist á miðvikudaginn fyrir tilstuðlan þríhliða samstarfshóps, sem skipaður er fulltrúum Rússlands og Úkraínu auk Öryggis- og samvinnustofnunar Evrópu, og var því fagnað af embættismönnum ESB.
output: The new cease-fire deal was reached Wednesday by members of the Tripartite Contact Group that includes representatives of Russia, Ukraine and the Organisation for Security and Cooperation in Europe, and was welcomed by EU officials.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Við hina hefðbundnu sunnudagsblessun á Péturstorgi minntist Frans páfi einnig á vopnahléið og sagði að það þyrfti að „endurbyggja traust og leggja grunninn fyrir mjög svo nauðsynlega og langþráða sátt við fólkið“.
output: During his traditional Sunday blessing in St. Peter's Square, Pope Francis also commended the cease-fire, adding that it needed to be put into practice ″to rebuild confidence and lay the foundations for a much needed and long awaited reconciliation with the people.″

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Lögreglan: Maður skotinn til bana í mótmælum í Texas
output: Police: Man fatally shot at protest in Texas

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
AUSTIN, Texas (AP) – Maður var skotinn til bana í mótmælum í Texas þegar hann nálgaðist bíl og ökumaðurinn í bílnum hleypti af vopni sínu, að sögn lögreglu.
output: AUSTIN, Texas (AP) - A man was fatally shot at a protest in Texas when he approached a vehicle and the driver inside opened fire, police said.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Katrina Ratliff, talskona lögreglunnar, sagði fréttamönnum snemma sunnudags að skotárásin hefði átti sér stað rétt fyrir klukkan 22:00 við mótmæli í Austin.
output: The shooting happened just before 10 p.m. during a protest in Austin, police spokesperson Katrina Ratliff told reporters early Sunday.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Maðurinn var færður á sjúkrahús þar sem hann var síðar úrskurðaður látinn.
output: The man was taken to a hospital where he was later pronounced dead.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Bíllinn hafði flautað, beygt niður veg og síðan hraðað ferðina í átt að mótmælendum, sagði vitnið Michael Capochiano við blaðið Austin American-Statesman.
output: The vehicle had honked, turned down a road and then sped toward protesters, witness Michael Capochiano told the Austin American-Statesman.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Maðurinn, sem var með riffil á sér, að sögn Capochiano, nálgaðist ökutækið og var skotinn af ökumanninum.
output: The man, who Capochiano said was carrying a rifle, approached the vehicle and was shot by the driver.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Ökumaðurinn keyrði svo á brott, sagði Capochiano.
output: The driver then drove away, Capochiano said.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Ratliff sagði fréttamönnum að fyrstu fregnir gæfu til kynna að „fórnarlambið gæti hafa verið með riffil“ og bætti við að hinn grunaði væri í varðhaldi og væri fús til samstarfs við lögreglu.
output: Initial reports indicated "the victim may have been carrying a rifle," Ratliff told reporters, adding that the suspect was detained and was cooperating with police.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Samkvæmt fréttastofum hafði hópurinn safnast saman vegna Black Lives Matter-mótmælanna á laugardaginn.
output: The crowd gathered Saturday for a Black Lives Matter protest, news outlets reported.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Mótmælunum var streymt í beinni á Facebook og þar mátti heyra í flautu bílsins og nokkrum skotum sem hleypt var af.
output: The demonstration was streamed live on Facebook and captured audio of a vehicle's horn honking and several gunshots being fired.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Markasúpa í fyrsta sigri Blika í júlí
output: A torrent of goals in Breiðablik's first win in July

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Breiðablik vann sinn fyrsta deildarsigur frá 29. júní er liðið lagði ÍA að velli, 5—3, í Pepsi Max-deild karla á Kópavogsvelli í kvöld.
output: Breiðablik won its first league victory since 29 June when the team won ÍA, 5-3, in the Pepsi Max Men's League at Kópavogsvöllur tonight.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Skagamenn tapa aftur á móti sínum þriðja leik í röð í deildinni.
output: Meanwhile, ÍA lost its third league match in a row.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Eftir að hafa unnið fyrstu þrjá leiki sína í deildinni lék Breiðablik fimm leiki án þess að fagna sigri og hafði liðið tapað þremur í röð fyrir leikinn við ÍA í kvöld.
output: After winning their first three league games, Breiðablik went five matches without a win and had lost three matches in a row before the match against ÍA tonight.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Það var því að duga eða drepast fyrir Blika sem mættu af miklum krafti inn í leikinn.
output: So it was do or die for the Breiðablik team, which began the game with great energy.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Alexander Helgi Sigurðarson kom liðinu í forystu með laglegri afgreiðslu á 11. mínútu eftir að Kristinn Steindórsson hafði sent hann í gegnum vörn ÍA.
output: Alexander Helgi Sigurðarson put the team ahead with a nice finish in the 11th minute after Kristinn Steindórsson had sent him through ÍA's defence.

instruction:

output: Delhi Metro Casts First Pier Under Phase-4 Work

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:

output: The Delhi Metro has reached a major milestone in the Phase-4 work as it cast its first pier on the under-construction Janakpuri West-R K Ashram Marg corridor, officials said on Sunday.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Stólpinn var steyptur í Keshopur og á upphækkuðum hluta milli Keshopur og Mukarba Chowk á laugardagskvöld.
output: The pier was cast at Keshopur on the elevated stretch between Keshopur and Mukarba Chowk on Saturday night.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Delhi Metro Rail Corporation (DMRC) steig annað mikilvægt skref á fjórða stigi framkvæmdanna er fyrsti stólpinn á þessu stigi stækkunar lestakerfisins var steyptur fyrir leiðina milli Janakpuri West og R K Ashram Marg,“ sagði í yfirlýsingu DMRC.
output: "The Delhi Metro Rail Corporation took another important step forward in its Phase 4 construction work as the first pier of this phase of Metro expansion was cast on the Janakpuri West-R K Ashram Marg Metro corridor," the DMRC said in a statement.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Þessi „mikilvægi framkvæmdaáfangi“ náðist þrátt fyrir mikinn skort á vinnuafli og aðrar skipulagslegar áskoranir af völdum heimsfaraldursins, að sögn starfsmanna.
output: This "major construction milestone" has been achieved, despite severe shortage of manpower and other logistical challenges because of the pandemic, officials said.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Meðalhæð stólpanna á þessari leið er 10 metrar.
output: The average height of piers on this corridor is 10m.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:

output: However, piers will be 20m high at Madhuban Chowk (crossing with Line 1) and 25m at Haiderpur Badli Mor where this line will cross Line 2.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Við Haiderpur Badli Mor verður brúarvegurinn í 28 metra hæð, sem er mesta hæð í sögu Dehli Metro að því er segir í yfirlýsingunni.
output: At Haiderpur Badli Mor, the viaduct level is going to be at 28m, the highest in the history of Delhi Metro, the statement said.

instruction:

output: Presently, the highest point is at Dhaula Kuan, where the Line 7 viaduct passes at a height of 23.6m.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Í samhengi byggingarverkfræði eru stólpar lóðrétt álagsberandi mannvirki sem styðja aðlæga enda tveggja brauta.
output: Piers, in terms of civil engineering are vertical loadbearing structures which act as intermediate support for adjacent ends of two spans.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:

output: They form the vertical support structures on which the elevated metro viaducts stand.

instruction:

output: Metro piers today dot innumerable road medians in Delhi through which elevated Metro corridors run.

instruction:

output: Pier numbers are now important landmarks for addresses across the Delhi-NCR.

instruction:

output: The 28.92-km-long Janakpuri West-R K Ahsram Marg corridor is an extension of Magenta Line and will come up with 22 stations.

instruction:

21,18 km af leiðinni verða upphækkaðir og 7,74 km verða neðanjarðar.
output: While 21.18 km of this corridor will be elevated, 7.74 km will be underground.

instruction:

output: Construction work on this particular section had started in December last year.
