output: On July 17, the work on the underground section of this corridor was commenced with the beginning of D Wall construction work at the Krishna Park Extension Metro station.

output: Under Phase-4, 61.679 km of new metro lines shall be constructed across three different corridors comprising 45 metro stations.

instruction:

output: These new sections shall provide interconnectivity among the already operational sections of Delhi Metro.

output: Out of this, 22.35 km will be underground while rest will be elevated.

output: "Paranoid" ambassador wants gun, armoured car and stab-proof vest - called subordinates agents of the "Deep State"

instruction:

instruction:

Vísar CBS í 12 diplómata, stjórnarerindreka og fyrrum fulltrúa auk einstaklinga sem þekkja til málsins.

instruction:

output: Gunter's conclusion was to demand that the US State Department obtain permission for the paranoid ambassador to carry arms in Iceland.

instruction:

output: He is also said to have requested an armoured car to transport him from one place to another in Iceland, and a stab-proof vest.

instruction:

output: The US State Department declined to say if there is any threat to the ambassador's safety, although US government officials said that the ambassador had been informed that Iceland is a safe country and that he is safe.

instruction:

output: Despite this, jobs listings for bodyguards were placed in Icelandic newspapers, according to CBS, which was part of meeting the ambassador's demands.

instruction:

output: According to CBS's report, the Iceland Ministry for Foreign Affairs declined to comment on the matter to CBS.

instruction:

output: However, the American news agency quoted its Icelandic sources as saying that no such request had been received by Icelandic authorities.

instruction:

output: CBS adds that Gunter had been talked out of walking around armed because it would offend the host nation, Iceland.

instruction:

instruction:

instruction:

output: Since taking over in May, Gunter is said to have created an "untenable" working environment, having already gone trough seven immediate subordinates, so-called Deputy Chiefs of Mission, who are the ambassador's second in command as well as being posted diplomats.

output: State Department leadership in Washington is said to be well aware of the situation in their Reykjavík embassy, but be reluctant to take charge of the chaos at the embassy in light of Gunter's connections to the White House.

instruction:

output: Gunter is also said to have had difficulty following orders from the State Department in Washington, and to have refused to return to DC while the Covid-19 pandemic was raging.

instruction:

output: Finally came back

instruction:

output: The Ministry for Foreign Affairs did not want to offer any comments to CBS, nor to DV's enquiry.

instruction:

output: Gunter is one of many of the Trump administration's politically appointed ambassadors to be noted for their unusual behaviour in recent months.

instruction:

output: Woody Johnson was harshly criticised, for example, when it was revealed that he had attempted to get the British Open moved to a Trump-owned golf course.

instruction:

output: The ambassador to South Africa has also been criticised for dismissing her Deputy Chief of Mission and then trying to appoint her son to the post.

instruction:

output: Seattle protesters clash with police over Trump's 'surge' of federal agents plan

instruction:

output: Police in Seattle used flashbang grenades and pepper spray on Saturday against protesters who set fire to construction trailers outside a youth jail, amid a wave of public anger over President Donald Trump's planned "surge" of federal agents into major cities.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:

output: The sounds of repeated small detonations rang out in the streets of the city in Washington state, and smoke rose from an area where demonstrators had set fire to trailers by a construction site for the youth detention facility.

instruction:

output: Demonstrators slashed car tires and smashed trailer windows.

instruction:

output: Police in riot gear faced off against the demonstrators, some of whom held up umbrellas against falling pellets of pepper spray.

instruction:

output: The Seattle Times newspaper quoted police as saying 16 people were arrested on suspicion of assault against officers, obstruction and failure to disperse.

instruction:

Pólland muni segja sig frá Evrópusamningi um að fyrirbyggja ofbeldi gegn konum
output: Poland to withdraw from European treaty aimed at preventing violence towards women

instruction:

output: Poland's right-wing government says it will withdraw from a European treaty aimed at preventing violence against women.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:

output: The Istanbul Convention is the world's first binding instrument to prevent violence against women but the Polish Justice Minister, Zbigniew Ziobro, described the text as "harmful" because it requires that schools teach children about gender from a sociological point of view.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Ziobro sagði um helgina að á mánudaginn myndi hann byrja að undirbúa formlegt ferli þess að landið segi sig frá samningnum.
output: Ziobro said over the weekend that on Monday he will begin preparing the formal process to withdraw from the treaty.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Þessi hugmyndafræðilegi þáttur tengist tilraunum til að breyta menntun í skólum og frístundastarfi, að því er varðar nám, viðhorf og sannfæringu ungrar kynslóðar Pólverja, út frá þeirri ályktun, sem að okkar áliti er röng, að líffræðilegt kyn sé gamaldags og að allt snúist í raun um félagsmenningarlegt kyn.“
output: "This ideological element is linked to the imperative to change education in schools and outside of school programs, in terms of learning, attitudes, convictions of the young Polish generation of students to make, in our opinion, the false assumption that biological sex is archaic, and in fact everything comes down to the socio-cultural gender."

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Ziobro telur að ákvæði samningsins um menntun barna og ungmenna sem og fjölskyldutengsl í samhengi LGBT-fólks vera óviðunandi.
output: In Ziobro's opinion, the convention's articles concerning the education of children and young people as well as family relationships in the LGBT context are not acceptable.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Við höfnum einnig LGBT-þættinum í umræðunni um fjölskyldutengsl, því þetta er skoðun sem haldið er á lofti af vinstri aktívistum eða hópum samkynhneigðra sem vilja að skoðanir þeirra verði að bindandi lögum,“ sagði hann.
output: "We also reject the LGBT element of promoting family relationships, a view propagated by activists from left-wing or homosexual circles who want to translate their beliefs into binding law," he said.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Evrópuráðið sagði á sunnudaginn að það væri „uggandi“ yfir því að Pólland hygðist segja sig frá samningnum.
output: The Council of Europe said on Sunday it is "alarmed" that Poland is aiming to withdraw from the Convention.

instruction:

output: In Warsaw on Friday, around 2,000 people including women's groups and other rights activists held a demonstration in front of the offices of Ordo Luris, a right-wing organisation that supports withdrawal from the convention.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Við verðum ekki fórnarlömb,“ kölluðu þau.
output: "We will not be victims" they chanted.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:

output: Demonstrations were also held in other Polish cities.

output: Poland signed the Istanbul Convention for the prevention and combating of violence against women and domestic violence in December 2012 and ratified it in 2015.

instruction:

output: Maurice Petty, Hall of Fame engine builder, dies at 81

output: KANSAS CITY, Kan.  (AP) - Maurice Petty, part of a stock car racing dynasty that includes father Lee and brother Richard and the first engine builder to be inducted into the NASCAR Hall of Fame, died Saturday.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Hann var 81 árs.
output: He was 81.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:

output: Petty's family did not disclose the cause of death.

output: No funeral arrangements have been announced.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:

output: While other family members were acclaimed for their ability behind the wheel, Maurice Petty earned the nickname "The Chief" for his ability to turn a wrench.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:

output: He helped his family win 198 races and seven championships in NASCAR's premier series, and he also built engines that carried Hall of Famer Buddy Baker, Jim Paschal and Pete Hamilton to victory.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Stjórinn var einn færasti vélvirkinn í sögu NASCAR,“ sagði stjórnarformaðurinn og framkvæmdastjórinn Jim France.
output: "The Chief was one of the most talented mechanics in NASCAR history," chairman and chief executive Jim France.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Hann kom með kraftinn sem hjálpaði Petty Enterprises að ná yfirburðum sínum á íþróttasviðinu.
output: "He provided the power that helped Petty Enterprises define dominance in sports.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:

output: While he was known for his work under the hood, Maurice played multiple behind-the-scenes roles, doing what it took to help deliver his cars to victory lane."

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:

output: Maurice Petty was born March 27, 1939, in Level Cross, North Carolina.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Hann fylgdi föður sínum á kappakstursbrautina þegar hann var lítill og þekking hans í vélvirkjun varð fljótlega veigamikill þáttur í því að landa Lee Petty sigri í 54 keppnum og þremur meistaratitlum.
output: He would tail his father to the track while growing up, and his mechanical know-how soon played an integral part in Lee Petty winning 54 races and three championships.

instruction:

output: He made 26 starts in the NASCAR Cup Series from 1960-64, finishing in the top 5 seven times with 16 top-10 runs.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:

output: But he quickly decided to focus on what happened under the hood rather than what happened behind the wheel, and that proved to be a good move for his older brother, who would rely on his engines during his period of dominance.

instruction:

Richard, sem síðan var kallaður „Kóngurinn“, vann fyrsta meistaratitilinn ásamt Stjóranum árið 1964 með Plymouth-bifreið.
output: Richard, who would take on the nickname "The King," won his first championship along with The Chief when he drove a Plymouth to the 1964 title.

instruction:

Þeir sigruðu aftur 1967, svo tvö ár í röð árin 1970 og 1971, og náðu í þrjá titla í viðbót áður en áttundi áratugurinn var á enda runninn.
output: They won again in 1967, back-to-back titles in 1970 and "71, and added three more before the 1970s drew to an end.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Með þessa sjö titla á bakinu deila þeir metinu í mestum fjölda titla með Dale Earnhardt og Jimmie Johnson.
output: The seven titles remains tied with Dale Earnhardt and Jimmie Johnson for the most in history.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Maurice Petty var einn af hinum sönnu brautryðjendum NASCAR og átti á ferli sínum hjá Petty Enterprises þátt í að byggja upp eitt af toppliðunum í NASCAR,“ sagði Winston Kelley í yfirlýsingu.
output: "Maurice Petty was one of the true pioneers in NASCAR who helped build one of NASCAR's dominant teams in Petty Enterprises," Hall of Fame executive director Winston Kelley said in a statement.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Þótt sigrar Petty séu skráðir sem 212 talsins á hann tilkall til vel yfir 250 sigra, ef teknar eru með allar vélarnar sem hann smíðaði fyrir keppinauta sína.
output: "Although the record shows 212 victories, Petty has well over 250 wins to his credit considering all the engines he built for his competitors.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Stjórans verður minnst að eilífu sem eins besta vélsmiðs í sögu NASCAR.“
output: Chief will forever be remember as one of the best to build power plants in NASCAR."

output: Lee Petty died in 2000 and Maurice Petty's wife of 52 years, Patricia, died in 2014.

output: He also was the uncle of former driver and broadcaster Kyle Petty and Truck Series crew chief Trent Owens.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Þótt við kveðjum nú Maurice Petty, einn af hinum sönnu og dugmiklu brautryðjendum og hetjum NASCAR, verður arfleifð hans og nafn geymd í minnum okkar, haldið á lofti og varðveitt um alla framtíð,“ sagði Kelley.
output: "While we have lost one of NASCAR's true, gritty pioneers and heroes, Maurice Petty's legacy and memory will always be remembered, preserved, celebrated and cherished," Kelley said.

instruction:

output: "We offer our sincere condolences to the Petty family."

output: Industry analyst Trilby Lundberg of the Lundberg Survey said Sunday it's the smallest rise in prices seen since late April.

output: During a tour of a Serbian army tank brigade, Vucic said his country cannot compete with "NATO donations" to its neighbors when it comes to weapons, "therefore we must do it alone."

output: Vucic did not specify what type of warplanes Serbia plans to buy, but the pro-government media said his government has officially asked the U.S. for the delivery of 20 fighter-bombers.

output: The reports said Washington has not yet responded to Belgrade's request and that in case of a refusal, it is likely to purchase Russian-made Sukhoi-25 attack aircraft.

output: Serbia, which claims military neutrality, has recently received a sophisticated anti-aircraft system from Russia, which has also provided fighter jets, attack helicopters and armored vehicles.

output: Another Serbian ally, China, has delivered military drones.

output: CHD - that also goes by the name of ischaemic heart disease - has three main symptoms: chest pain (angina), heart attacks and heart failure.

instruction:

Önnur sjúkdómseinkenni geta verið hjartsláttarónot og mikil mæði.
output: Other symptoms of the disease can include heart palpitations and unusual breathlessness.

instruction:

output: "Chocolate contains heart-healthy nutrients such as flavonoids, methylxanthines, polyphenols and stearic acid which may reduce inflammation and increase good cholesterol."

instruction:

output: Good cholesterol, otherwise known as high-density lipoprotein (HDL), collects "bad" cholesterol - the kind that furs up the heart's arteries - and transports it to the liver.

instruction:

„Slæma“ kólesterólið (lágþéttnifituprótín) er brotið niður í lifrinni og því næst skilst það úr líkamanum.
output: In the liver, "bad" (low-density lipoprotein) cholesterol is broken down and excreted from the body.

output: The findings were based on previous research that concluded that consuming cocoa (found in chocolate) reduced the risk of a heart attack.

instruction:

output: He added that the villagers brought an ambulance to retrieve the driver, and then attempted to retrieve the truck's goods, estimated to be worth three million LE.

instruction:

output: "The most important thing for us was to save the driver's life, protect the shipment, and open up the international road," he explained.

instruction:

output: The villagers were more than ready to bring water and shelter the injured driver, Bahr said, adding that all they wanted was to ensure that he would enter and leave the village safely.

instruction:

output: Congress Was Already Broken.  The Coronavirus Could Make It Worse.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Heimsfaraldurinn einn og sér er ákall til kjörinna fulltrúa okkar um þá forystu og sýn sem við búumst við á erfiðleikatímum,“ segir í skýrslu sem unnin var upp úr viðtalsröð sem haldin var af Leonard Steinhorn, prófessor í samskiptafræðum hjá American University, og Mark Sobol, höfundi og sérfræðingi í skipulagsþróun og stjórnun.
output: "The pandemic alone is a call to our elected officials for the type of leadership and vision we expect at a moment of crisis," says the report, which grew out of interviews conducted by Leonard Steinhorn, a professor of communication at American University, and Mark Sobol, an author and expert on organizational development and executive leadership.

instruction:

output: "But we are also facing another reckoning, one over our nation's original sin and the racial inequities that have beset our country since its founding."

instruction:

output: The study ticks through familiar themes when it comes to assessing the sorry state of Congress: the lack of any real across-the-aisle relationships, a schedule that limits opportunities for interaction, too much power concentrated in leadership, constant fund-raising demands, discouragement of bipartisanship, the negative influence of round-the-clock media, the fact that the most important election for lawmakers is often their primary, and the shutting out of minority-party voices.

instruction:

output: It also warns that the shifts toward a more virtual Congress as a result of the pandemic, such as a new system of proxy voting in the House that allows lawmakers to cast their votes without traveling to Washington, could exacerbate the existing problems.

instruction:

output: If the idea of a remote Congress takes hold, the report suggests, it would be a serious setback to efforts to enhance bipartisan interaction.

output: "Because of the pandemic, Congress was forced to conduct much of its business virtually, and we certainly understand why," the report said.

instruction:

output: The document says Congress needs "more and not less in-person interaction among members of Congress.

output: They need to learn more about each other's districts, hold civil conversations aimed at finding common ground, build relationships of trust that can lead understanding and solutions."

output: In a week when Representative Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez, Democrat of New York, was verbally assaulted without provocation by Representative Ted Yoho, Republican of Florida, and fellow Republicans ganged up on Representative Liz Cheney, Republican of Wyoming, in a hostile confrontation, the call for civility rang especially true.

output: During the interview, Demings made it clear that she objects to Trump commuting the prison sentence of Roger Stone, who was convicted of lying to Congress (among other felonies) as well as his pardoning of other felons convicted of similar crimes, stating, "The gall of pardoning your friends, those who lied and cheated to cover up for your wrongdoings."

output: FDNY diversity official says 'most definitely' OK to exclude white firefighter from color guard

instruction:

output: An FDNY diversity official has said that it's 'most definitely' acceptable to keep a white firefighter off a ceremonial color guard so the flag bearers could all be black, according to a new report.

instruction:

output: White firefighter Lt. Daniel McWilliams filed a lawsuit claiming racial bias after he was removed from a flag-bearing unit at a November 2017 memorial mass honoring deceased members of the Vulcan Society, a fraternal society of black firefighters.

instruction:

output: And FDNY's chief diversity and inclusion officer, lawyer Cecilia Loving, has defended the decision at a New York state Division of Human Rights trial, The New York Post reports.

Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:

output: McWilliams was one of the three FDNY firefighters seen in an iconic photo as they hoist the American flag at Ground Zero in the days after the 9/11 attacks.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Samkvæmt kæru McWilliams hafði viðhafnardeild slökkviliðsins valið hann til að vera einn að fánaberunum í heiðursverði á minningarathöfninni.
output: According to McWilliams' complaint, he been selected by the FDNY Ceremonial Unit to serve as one of the flag bearers in the color guard at the memorial service.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Að vera fánaberi á þessari athöfn var „mikill heiður og forréttindi“ fyrir McWilliams, að því er fram kemur í lögsókninni samkvæmt CNN.
output: Being a flag bearer at the event was an 'esteemed honor and privilege' for McWilliams, according to his lawsuit, CNN reported.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Þegar hann mætti á athöfnina var honum þó meinað að taka þátt í heiðursverðinum af þáverandi forseta Vulcan-félagsins, Reginu Wilson, því að því er fullyrt er hafði hún beðið um að allir fánaberar við messuna yrðu svartir.
output: Upon his arrival at the event, however, McWilliams was barred from participating in the color guard by then-Vulcan Society president Regina Wilson because she allegedly had asked for an all-black color guard at the mass.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Hún bað síðan McWilliams – 29 ára gamlan starfsmann slökkviliðs New York-borgar – um að aðstoða á annan hátt.“
output: She then asked McWilliams - a 29-year FDNY veteran - to 'help in a different capacity.'

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Á meðal þess sem fullyrt er að hún hafi beðið hann um að gera er að veita óbreyttum borgurum fylgd og stilla einkennisklæddum slökkviliðsmönnum upp fjarri messunni.
output: Among those duties was allegedly asking him to escort civilians and muster uniformed officers into formation away from the mass.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
McWilliams fullyrðir í lögsókn sinni að hann hafi spurt Wilson hvort hún væri að taka hann úr heiðursverðinum því hann væri ekki svartur.
output: McWilliams claimed in his suit that he asked Wilson if she was removing him from the color guard because he's not black.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Hún staðfesti að það væri svo, sagði hann.
output: She confirmed that was the case, he said.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:

output: Wilson, a 21-year FDNY veteran who was also part of the 9/11 rescue efforts, apparently replaced McWilliams with one of the members of the Vulcan Society.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
McWilliams fullyrðir að hann hafi yfirgefið minningarathöfnina „til að hlífa sér við frekari skömm, niðurlægingu og smán,“ er vinir og samstarfsfólk heyrðu það sem fór þeim á milli, samkvæmt New York Daily News.
output: McWilliams claimed he left the memorial 'to save himself from further shame, humiliation and embarrassment,' as their exchange was overheard by friends and colleagues, the New York Daily News reported.

instruction:

output: During her trial testimony, McWilliams' lawyer, Keith Sullivan, asked Loving - who is black - 'So, a request for an all-black color guard is not discriminatory?'

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Nei, það er það ekki,“ sagði Loving, samkvæmt New York Post.
output: 'No, it isn't,' Loving said, according to the New York Post.

instruction:

output: Sullivan also asked Loving if it's OK to request an all-black color guard, to which she was quoted as saying, 'Most definitely.'

instruction:

output: By way of explanation, Loving said that it was OK to swap out a white person for a black person to 'uplift our identities and our separate ethnicities in order to instill a sense of pride and community and support for one another.'

instruction:

McWilliams lagði fyrst fram kæru um mismunun út frá kynþætti hjá slökkviliði New York-borgar í janúar 2018.
output: McWilliams first filed his racial bias complaint with the FDNY in January 2018.

instruction:

Hann höfðaði síðan mál gegn Wilson, slökkviliði New York-borgar, New York-borg og ónefndum einstaklingum í maí 2019.
output: He then filed a lawsuit against Wilson, the FDNY, the city of New York and unnamed individuals in May 2019.

instruction:

Sullivan sagði að eftir að McWilliams lagði fram kæru sína hefðu stuðningsmenn Wilson hefnt sín á honum og ógnað honum.
output: After filing his complaint, Sullivan said that McWilliams was retaliated against and intimidated by Wilson's supporters.

instruction:

Á einum tímapunkti mun einn stuðningsmanna hennar hafa lagt hendur á McWilliams og sagt: „Ég hef heyrt um þig, þau sögðu mér að þú myndir haga þér svona, og nú veist þú hver ég er.“
output: At one point, one of her supporters allegedly laid hands on McWilliams and said: 'I've heard about you, they told me you'd act this way, and now you know me.'

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Í útdrætti skrifaði Sullivan að það hefði verið „hörmulegt“ að útiloka McWilliams frá heiðursverði við messuna og merki um að eitt gilti ekki um alla hjá slökkviliðinu.
output: In a brief, Sullivan wrote that rejecting McWilliams from the mass' color guard position was 'deplorable' and a sign of double standards in the fire department.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Ef þú ert svartur einstaklingur og mismunar hvítum einstaklingi á vinnustað færðu í mesta lagi áminningu,“ sagði Sullivan.
output: 'If you're black and you discriminate against a white person in the workplace, you get a slap on the wrist at best,' Sullivan wrote.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Wilson fékk samkvæmt lögsókninni „ráðgjöf í eina klukkustund“ vegna meðferðar hennar á McWilliams.
output: Wilson, according to the lawsuit, received 'one hour of counseling' over her treatment of McWilliams.

instruction:

Á meðan fær hvítur einstaklingur sem mismunar svörtum einstaklingi „harkalega refsingu“, skrifaði Sullivan.
output: Meanwhile, a white person who discriminates against a person of color receives 'heavy-handed discipline and punishment,' Sullivan wrote.

instruction:

„Slökkvilið New York-borgar hefur búið til stefnu og ferli sem ætlað er að þóknast meðlimum Vulcan-félagsins, sem hegða sér með rasískum hætti, afsaka gjörðir þeirra og liðsinna þeim ... og þetta þarf að stöðva,“ skrifaði Sullivan einnig.
output: 'The FDNY has created a policy and procedure for bending over backwards, coming up with excuses and accommodating members of the Vulcan Society ... who commit racist acts, and it has to stop,' Sullivan also wrote.

instruction:

Ógnaði gangandi vegfaranda og heimtaði peninga

output: They had fled the scene by the time police arrived "as they probably knew they were not in the right, considering how far off New Year's Eve is."

output: Former governor Sergei Furgal is very popular, and tens of thousands of city residents protested when he was detained and taken to Moscow earlier this month, accused of having ordered the murders of three businessmen fifteen years ago.

output: On the other hand, Moscow police arrested at least 10 people who had gathered in Pushkin Square to support protesters in Khabarovsk, according to UK newspaper The Guardian.

output: Furgal's party, the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia, is a party of hardline nationalists and analysts consider it to be somewhat supportive of the Kremlin in most matters.

output: However, the same analysts told the BBC that Furgal's victory in the governor elections — which was clear and decisive — had been a considerable shock for Putin and United Russia, and an indication of the Kremlin's weakening hold on the eastern regions.

Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Ég er viss um að við getum náð því.“
output: I'm confident we can reach that."

output: In fact, without radical action, the only school subject that focuses specifically on our history - "Australian history," at year 12 - will die within the next five years, maybe sooner.

output: Over the past six years, this figure has been almost halved, with almost 100 fewer students enrolling every year.

output: A key reason why so few students choose to study Australian history in year 12 is that little has been done in earlier years to fire their passion.

output: So across years 7 and 8, students complete only one short unit on ancient "Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander peoples and culture."

Ráðuneytið svarar ekki spurningum er varða ósk Gunters um að vopnbúast og íslenska utanríkisráðuneytið vill ekki segja til um hvort Bandaríkin hafi formlega óskað eftir því að sendiherrann mætti bera skotvopn, og segjast venjulega ekki tjá sig um öryggismál erlendra sendiskrifstofa.
output: The State Department did not answer questions about Gunter's desire to arm himself and the Icelandic Ministry for Foreign Affairs declines to confirm whether the U.S. officially sought permission for the ambassador to carry a firearm, adding that they generally do not comment on the security details of diplomatic missions.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
CBS hefur hins vegar eftir íslenskum heimildarmönnum sínum að beiðni þess efnis hafi aldrei verið lögð fram, og samkvæmt þremur bandarískum embættismönnum var Gunter fenginn ofan af þessum áætlunum sínum þar sem þær gætu orðið til þess að móðga heimamenn á Íslandi.
output: However, CBS sources in Iceland said that such a request was never made, and three US officials claimed that Gunter was talked out of these plans as they could cause offence to Icelanders.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Í umfjöllun CBS er jafnframt fjallað um hin ýmsu vandkvæði sem hafa verið viðloðandi bandaríska sendiráðið á Íslandi síðan Gunter var skipaður sendiherra á síðasta ári, en hann mun þegar hafa skipt varasendiherra sínum út sjö sinnum.
output: The CBS report also addresses the various problems around the US Embassy in Iceland since Gunter was appointed last year, including the fact that he has already replaced seven Deputy Chiefs of Mission.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Þannig er fyrsti varasendiherrann sagður hafa undirbúið sig lengi undir starf sitt og lært íslensku aðeins til þess að hafa verið neitað um stöðuna á síðustu stundu af því Gunter „leist ekki á hann“ á fyrsta fundi þeirra.
output: The first deputy is said to have prepared extensively, including learning Icelandic, only to be refused the post at the last minute because Gunter "didn't like the look of him" at their first meeting.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Eftirmönnum hans hefur ekki gengið mikið betur undir stjórn Gunters.
output: His successors haven't fared much better under Gunter's command.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Stjórnendur innan utanríkisráðuneytis Bandaríkjanna eru sagðir meðvitaðir um stöðuna í sendiráðinu á Íslandi, en tregir til þess að grípa inn í mál er tengjast forsetanum nánum böndum.
output: Senior leadership at the State Department is reportedly aware of the situation at the US Embassy in Iceland, but has been reluctant to interfere in matters closely connected to the President.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Auk alls þessa er Gunter sagður tregur til þess að fylgja hinum ýmsu reglum utanríkisþjónustunnar og virða valdaröðina.
output: In addition to all this, Gunter is said to be unwilling to follow various foreign service protocols and respect the chain of command.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Gunter ferðaðist til Bandaríkjanna í febrúar til þess að taka þátt í ráðstefnu í Washington, og er sagður hafa neitað að snúa aftur til Íslands í kjölfarið og látið tímabundinn staðgengil sinn sinna starfi sínu svo mánuðum skipti, og það í miðjum heimsfaraldri.
output: In February, after attending a conference in Washington, Gunter allegedly refused to return to Iceland, leaving a temporary deputy in charge of his post for months, in the middle of a pandemic.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Mun Gunter jafnvel hafa óskað eftir því að fá að sinna starfi sínu í fjarvinnu og sagst ekki ætla að snúa aftur til Íslands nema utanríkisráðherrann sjálfur, Mike Pompeo, óskaði eftir því sérstaklega.
output: Gunter is even said to have requested to work remotely and stated that he would not return to Iceland unless specifically asked to do so by Secretary of State Mike Pompeo.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Samkvæmt upplýsingum frá utanríkisráðuneyti Bandaríkjanna hafði Gunter ákveðið að taka sér persónulegt leyfi að ráðstefnunni lokinni og kórónuveirufaraldurinn tafið för hans enn frekar, en samkvæmt heimildum CBS munu fjölmargir innan ráðuneytisins hafa beðið Gunter að snúa aftur til Íslands, en það hafi hann ekki gert fyrr en í maí, í kjölfar þess að Pompeo hafði við hann samband og bað hann vinsamlegast að snúa aftur í sendiráðið á Íslandi.
output: According to a statement from the State Department, Gunter had decided to go on personal leave after the conference and his return was further delayed by the coronavirus pandemic, but according to CBS sources, many within the Department had asked Gunter to return to Iceland, but he didn't do so until May, when Pompeo contacted him and asked him to please return to the US Embassy in Iceland.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Í umfjöllun CBS er jafnframt greint frá óvinsældum Gunters á Íslandi, sérstaklega í tengslum við tíst þar sem hann kallar kórónuveiruna „ósýnilegu Kínaveiruna“ og hefur hlotið mikla gagnrýni fyrir.
output: The CBS report also notes Gunter's unpopularity in Iceland, particularly in relation to a heavily criticised tweet where he referred to the coronavirus as "the invisible China Virus".

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Gunter er einn fjölmargra, nánast óreyndra á sviði utanríkismálaþjónustu sendiherra sem skipaðir hafa verið í stjórnartíð Donalds Trump Bandaríkjaforseta.
output: Gunter is one of many ambassadors with practically no diplomatic experience who have been appointed under President Donald Trump.

instruction:

Sachin Pilot gegn Ashok Gehlot; Bharatiya Janata-flokkurinn segir stjórnarkreppu í ríkinu; Kongressflokkurinn vill atkvæðagreiðslu
output: Sachin Pilot Vs Ashok Gehlot; BJP Says State In Political Crisis; Congress Wants Floor Test

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Ashok Gehlot sagði að ef þess gerðist þörf þyrfti Kongressflokkurinn að efna til setumótmæla fyrir utan heimili forsætisráðherra.
output: Ashok Gehlot said if necessary, Congress hold a sit-in outside the prime minister's home.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Á laugardaginn, degi eftir friðsamleg mótmæli við Raj Bhawan í Jaipur, sagði Ashok Gehlot, aðalráðherra Rajasthan, að ef þess gerðist þörf þyrftu þingmenn Kongressflokksins að hitta forsetann og efna til setumótmæla fyrir utan heimili forsætisráðherrans til að leiða krísuna í ríkinu til lykta.
output: A day after leading a dharna at the Raj Bhawan in Jaipur, Rajasthan Chief Minister Ashok Gehlot on Saturday said if necessary, the Congress MLAs will meet the President and hold a sit-in outside the prime minister's residence to settle the crisis in the state.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Á fundi þingmanna Kongressflokksins gaf Gehlot til kynna að áformað væri að halda atkvæðagreiðslu til að athuga hvort meirihluti þingmanna flokksins og samherjar stæðu með honum í valdabaráttunni.
output: At a meeting of the Congress Legislature Party (CLP), Mr Gehlot indicated that the plan was to have a floor test to prove that the majority of Congress MLAs and allies are with him in the tussle for power.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Hann sagði ríkisstjórnina hafa meirihluta og vill fara í atkvæðagreiðslu,“ segir í yfirlýsingu Mahesh Joshi, aðalflokksvarðar Kongressflokksins, eftir fundinn.
output: "He said the government has the majority and wants to go to the assembly floor," a statement issued by Congress chief whip Mahesh Joshi after the CLP meeting said.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Þingflokksfundurinn var haldinn á hóteli þar sem þeir þingmenn sem styðja Gehlot hafa haldið sig síðustu daga.
output: The CLP meeting was held at the hotel where the MLAs in the Gehlot camp are holed up for days.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Aðalráðherrann bað okkur um að vera búin undir að dvelja lengur á hótelinu.
output: "The chief minister asked us to remain prepared to stay longer at the hotel.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Ef þess þyrfti, sagði hann, myndi hann hitta forsetann og einnig halda friðsamleg mótmæli fyrir utan heimili forsætisráðherra“ sagði flokksleiðtogi.
output: If required, he said, we would go to meet the President and would also hold a dharna outside the prime minister's residence," a party leader said.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Aðalráðherra Rajasthan getur kallað þingið saman og látið Kongressflokkinn sýna fram á meirihluta sinn, sagði flokksleiðtoginn Rahul Gandhi á föstudaginn, og gaf til kynna að komist hefði upp um ráðabrugg Bharatiya Janata-flokksins um að steypa ríkisstjórn Ashok Gehlot af stóli.
output: The Rajasthan Governor must call an assembly session to let the Congress prove its majority, party leader Rahul Gandhi on Friday said, alleging that the BJP's conspiracy to topple the Ashok Gehlot government was now clear.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Landinu er nú stjórnað samkvæmt lögum og stjórnarskrá.
output: "The country is ruled in accordance with the law and constitution.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Ríkisstjórnir eru myndaðar og starfa með umboði fólksins.
output: Governments are formed and run based on people's mandate.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Það hefur komist upp um ráðabrugg Bharatiya Janata um að steypa ríkisstjórn Rajasthan af stóli.
output: BJP's conspiracy to topple the Rajasthan government is clear.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Þetta er móðgun við 80 milljónir íbúa Rajasthan.
output: This is an insult to 8 crore people of Rajasthan.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Aðalráðherra verður að kalla þingið saman til að sannleikurinn komi á undan landinu,“ sagði Gandhi í tísti á hindí.
output: The governor must call assembly session so that the truth comes before the country," Mr Gandhi tweeted in Hindi.

instruction:

Ashok Gehlot, aðalráðherra Rajasthan, sagði þingmönnum Kongressflokksins á laugardaginn að hann væri reiðubúinn að fara á fund forseta Indlands til að tryggja að það sem hann kallar „ráðabrugg Bharatiya Janata“ um að tefja fyrir traustsyfirlýsingu með atkvæðagreiðslu takist ekki.
output: Rajasthan Chief Minister Ashok Gehlot told Congress MLAs on Saturday that he was ready to go to the President of India to make sure that what he calls a "BJP conspiracy" to stall a test of strength does not succeed.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Gehlot, sem mótmælti í margar klukkustundir við heimili ríkisstjórans Kalraj Mishra á föstudaginn til að ýta á þingfund, fundaði með þingmönnum Kongressflokksins og ríkisstjórn á laugardaginn og eftir fundinn voru nýjar tillögur smíðaðar og samþykktar af ríkisstjórn.
output: Mr Gehlot, who protested for hours at Governor Kalraj Mishra's home on Friday to press for an assembly session, held meetings with Congress MLAs and his cabinet on Saturday, after which a fresh proposal was drawn up and passed by the cabinet.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Mishra bað Gehlot í gærkvöldi um að leggja þingfundarbeiðnina inn aftur og vísaði í sex andmæli.
output: Mr Mishra had last night asked Mr Gehlot to re-submit the request for an assembly session, citing six objections.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Tillagan verður fljótlega send til ríkisstjóra.
output: This proposal will be sent to the Governor soon.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Gehlot hefur sakað ríkisstjórann um að tefja fyrir þingfundinum þar sem hann sé „undir pressu“ til að tefja fyrir atkvæðagreiðslunni sem sker úr um traust á ríkisstjórn hans.
output: Mr Gehlot has accused the Governor of delaying the session because he is "under pressure" to stall his government's test of strength.

instruction:

Þegar Gehlot hitti ríkisstjórn sína fundaði sendinefnd Bharatiya Janata í forystu leiðtogans Satish Poonia og leiðtoga stjórnarandstöðunnar Gulab Chandra Kataria með ríkisstjóranum til að ræða um stöðu COVID-19 í ríkinu.
output: As Mr Gehlot met with his cabinet, a BJP delegation led by Rajasthan BJP leader Satish Poonia and Leader of Opposition Gulab Chandra Kataria met the Governor to discuss the COVID-19 situation in the state.

Að sögn slökkviliðsins í Borgarnesi tókst vel að slökkva eldinn í bílnum og er þess nú beðið að hann verði fjarlægður.
output: According to the Borgarnes fire brigade, efforts to put out the fire in the car were successful, and the car is expected to be moved soon.

output: There were two men in the car when the fire broke out due to a technical malfunction in the car, but both are safe and completely unharmed.

output: Traffic had to be directed while firefighting work was underway as there is heavy traffic in both directions in the area.

instruction:

Leikkonunni Spencer Grammer gefinn skurður fyrir utan veitingastað á Manhattan
output: Actress Spencer Grammer slashed outside Manhattan restaurant

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
NEW YORK – Leikkonan Spencer Grammar sagðist hafa verið að reyna að róa æstan mann þegar hann skar hana á handlegg og stakk vin hennar í bakið fyrir utan veitingastað í New York-borg síðastliðinn föstudag.
output: NEW YORK -- Actress Spencer Grammer says she was trying to calm an agitated man when he slashed her in the arm and stabbed her friend in the back Friday outside a New York City restaurant.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Grammer, sem er 36 ára, sagði US Weekly að hún og vinur hennar hefðu gert það sem allir aðrir hefðu gert í sömu aðstæðum og að þau hefðu verið að reyna að koma í veg fyrir að ástandið versnaði þegar ráðist var að þeim.
output: Grammer, 36, told US Weekly that she and her friend "did what anyone else would do in the same situation" and were "attempting to prevent the altercation from escalating" when they were attacked.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Grammer og hinn 32 ára gamli vinur hennar sátu að snæðingi við útiborð á The Black Ant í East Village-hverfi Manhattan um klukkan 23:30
output: Grammer and her 32-year-old friend were eating at an outside table at The Black Ant in Manhattan's East Village neighborhood around 11:30 p.m.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
á föstudaginn þegar karlmaður gekk upp að þeim og krafðist þess að fá afgreiðslu, en þá var verið að loka veitingastaðnum.
output: Friday when the man ambled up and demanded to be served as the restaurant was closing down.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Grammer og vinur hennar særðust þegar þau reyndu að „leysa úr ágreiningi milli óþekkts karlmanns og annarra gesta á staðnum,“ að sögn lögreglu.
output: Grammer and her friend were hurt as they "attempted to break up a dispute between the unidentified male and other patrons at the location," police said.

instruction:

Karlmaðurinn hljóp af staðnum eftir að hafa sært hægri handlegg Grammer og stungið vin hennar í mjóbakið með óþekktum oddhvössum hlut, sagði lögregla.
output: The man ran away after wounding Grammer in the right arm and her friend in the lower back with an unknown sharp object, police said.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Enginn hefur verið handtekinn.
output: No arrests have been made.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Grammer, sem talar inn fyrir Summer í þáttunum „Rick and Morty“ og lék áður í þáttaröðinni „Greek“ á ABC Family, er dóttir „Frasier“-stjörnunnar Kelsey Grammer og leikkonunnar Doreen Alderman.
output: Grammer, who provides the voice of Summer on "Rick and Morty" and previously starred on the ABC Family series "Greek," is the daughter of "Frasier" star Kelsey Grammer and actress Doreen Alderman.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Grammer sagði að bæði hún og vinur hennar gerðu ráð fyrir því að ná sér fljótt.
output: Grammer said she and her friend both expect to recover quickly.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Hvorugt þeirra varð fyrir alvarlegum innri áverkum, sagði hún.
output: Neither suffered serious internal injuries, she said.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Í yfirlýsingu til US Weekly þakkaði Grammer þeim sem brugðust við á vettvangi og starfsfólki Bellevue-sjúkrahússins sem hlúði að þeim og minntist á „ótrúlega baráttu“ þessa starfsfólks við kórónuveirufaraldurinn.
output: In her statement to Us Weekly, Grammer thanked the first responders and Bellevue Hospital staff that treated them and noted the "incredible battle" those workers have fought against the coronavirus pandemic.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Það snerti okkur mjög að fá tækifæri til að þakka þeim í eigin persónu,“ sagði Grammer.
output: "It was very moving for us to have the opportunity to thank them in person," Grammer said.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Ég vil ekki vera eins og McGregor og sýna peningana mína ...
output: 'I don't want to be like McGregor and show my money...

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Ég er hér til að hjálpa fólki“ – Chimaev eftir sögulegt kvöld á UFC Fight Island – RT Sport News
output: I'm here to help people' - Chimaev after making history on UFC Fight Island - RT Sport News

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Bardagakappinn Khamzat Chimaev frá Rússlandi er nú nefndur sem næsta stjarna UFC eftir að hafa skráð sig í söguna á Fight Island, en hann segist ekki stefna á að flagga auði sínum á oflátungslegan hátt líkt og Conor McGregor.
output: Khamzat Chimaev is being hailed as a UFC star-in-waiting after making history on Fight Island, but the Russian-born fighter says he is not planning any ostentatious displays of wealth similar to the likes of Conor McGregor.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Chimaev bar Norður-Írann Rhys McKee ofurliði í bardaga þeirra í veltivigt í Abú Dabí á laugardagskvöld er hann sigraði keppinaut sinn þegar þrjár mínútur og 9 sekúndur voru liðnar af fyrstu lotu með því að láta höggin dynja á honum í gólfinu.
output: Chimaev overwhelmed Northern Ireland's Rhys McKee in their welterweight contest in Abu Dhabi on Saturday night, finishing his opponent with a ground-and-pound barrage 3 minutes and 9 seconds into the first round.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Sigurinn skráði nafn Chimaev í sögubækur UFC fyrir stysta tíma milli sigra í nútímasögu keppninnar, þar sem aðeins 10 dagar voru liðnir frá því að hann sigraði Bretann John Phillips með álíka afgerandi hætti, þá í millivigt.
output: The win ensured Chimaev etched his name into the UFC history books by claiming the shortest-ever period between victories in the modern era of the promotion, coming just 10 days after he defeated Britain's John Phillips in similarly destructive fashion - on that occasion at middleweight.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Chimaev, sem er með sigurhlutfallið 8-0, fékk 50.000 bandaríkjadala bónus fyrir frammistöðu kvöldsins á móti McKee og hefur fangað athygli MMA-heimsins svo fyllilega að hann er nú nefndur „Khalib 2.0“, sem segja má að sé óumflýjanlegur samanburður vegna þess hve mikil líkindi eru milli yfirburða Chimaev og UFC-meistarans í léttvigt og þar sem hann er fæddur í Téténíu, sem er nærri heimahögum Khabib í Dagestan.
output: The 8-0 Chimaev pocketed a $50,000 Performance-of-the-Night bonus for his work against McKee and has firmly earned the attention of the MMA world, being tipped as 'Khabib 2.0' - a perhaps inevitable comparison given Chimaev displays a similar oppressive dominance to the UFC lightweight champ, and was born in Chechnya, which neighbors Khabib's own Dagestani homeland.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Þrátt fyrir nýfundna frægð og fjárhagslegan ávinning hefur hinn þýðmælti Chimaev sagt að hann myndi ekki vera gjarn á að flagga auði sínum líkt og MMA-peningavélin Conor McGregor eða jafningi hans í boxheiminum, Floyd Mayweather Jr.
output: Despite the newfound fame and financial boost, the softly-spoken Chimaev said he would not be prone to shows of wealth along the lines of MMA money-man Conor McGregor or his boxing equivalent Floyd Mayweather Jr.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Ég geri þetta ekki bara fyrir mig, ég geri þetta fyrir alla sem ég get hjálpað.
output: "I do this not only for me, I do this for everybody I can help.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Ég vil ekki vera eins og Mayweather og McGregor, sýna peningana mína eða eitthvað þvíumlíkt.
output: I don't want to be like Mayweather and McGregor, to show my money or something like that.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Ég vil hjálpa fólki,“ svaraði Chimaev þegar hann var spurður að því á Fight Island hvernig hann myndi nota bónusinn.
output: I want to help people," replied Chimaev when asked on Fight Island about how he would spend his bonus.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Hann hefur meðal annars vakið eftirtekt liðsfélaga Conor McGregor og virka Twitter-notandans Dillon Danis, sem skrifaði á samfélagsmiðilinn að hann gæti „auðveldlega“ sigrað Chimaev með uppgjafartaki.
output: One man he has gained the attention of is Conor McGregor teammate and arch Twitter protagonist Dillon Danis, who took to the platform to claim he could submit Chimaev "easily."

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Það stóð ekki á eitruðu svari frá bardagakappanum sem gengur undir nafninu „Borz“, eða „úlfur“ á móðurmáli hans tétensku, sem sagði að hann myndi „mala Danis með augun lokuð“.
output: That drew a withering response from the fighter known as 'Borz' - or 'wolf' in his native Chechen - who said he would "smash Danis with his eyes closed."

instruction:

instruction:

output: 50 People To Be Allowed In Mosques On Eid, No Mass Prayers In Eidgah: Karnataka

instruction:

output: It said the Hilal committee has decided that the Eid-ul- Azha, also known as Bakrid, would be celebrated on July 31 in Udupi, Dakshina Kannada and Kodagu districts while it would be on August 1 in the rest of the state.

instruction:

output: Noting that mass prayers were one of the important rituals Muslims perform during Bakrid, the order said in view of the COVID-19 pandemic such events at Eidgah and other places were prohibited.

output: Karnataka allowed temples, mosques and other places of worship to be open for devotees from June 8 with all COVID-19 preventive measures in place.

output: "Yes, it's so unlike what has been found here before that there's really no likelihood of it having been brewing here," answers Kamilla.

instruction:

output: "Instead, everything points to these persons having come into some contact with a person who has just arrived from overseas, without them being aware of it themselves."

instruction:

instruction:

output: "It could of course be a tourist who has since left the country, but it could also be someone who is asymptomatic and doesn't realise that they are infected, in which case more infections could obviously follow.

instruction:

Við verðum á tánum næstu daga til að fylgjast með því.“

instruction:

output: But there are persons who went into quarantine in connection with one of the infections yesterday who now have symptoms and have been tested," Kamilla continues.

output: But we have to be very vigilant, of course, and keep in mind that there are certain limits to how many tests we can do.

output: No one has ever stepped into the ranks of Fleetwood Mac without a reverence for Peter Green and his talent, and to the fact that music should shine bright and always be delivered with uncompromising passion."

output: Fleetwood Mac would go on to achieve great acclaim and worldwide fame with additional line-ups including Lindsey Buckingham and Stevie Nicks on seminal albums including Rumours and Tusk.

output: Prince Joachim said to be in a stable condition

instruction:

output: Prince Joachim, the younger son of Margrethe Þórhildur, Queen of Denmark, and the late Prince Henrik of Denmark, is still in hospital in Toulouse, France, where he underwent surgery on a blood clot in his brain the day before yesterday.

instruction:

output: DR, the Danish Broadcasting Corporation, quoted a spokesman of the Danish court as saying that it was unclear how long the prince, who is 51, will remain in the hospital, but that his condition was stable.

output: According to DR's report, tests are now being conducted to determine the effects of the blood clot on the prince's health.

output: According to DR's health correspondent, physician Peter Qvortrup Geisling, the effects of a blood clot in the brain often do not become apparent until days after the operation.

instruction:

output: Prince Joachim, whose full name is Joachim Holger Waldemar Christian and who is also Count of Monpezat, was staying at the family vineyard, Château de Cayx in the South of France when he fell ill on Friday night.

instruction:

output: Google Pixel 4 able to photograph Milky Way

output: Along with adding 2x optical zoom, the second lens allows the Pixel 4 to see in 3D; thus doing a better job of blurring the background in portrait mode than previous Pixel handsets, which relied purely on software to achieve this "bokeh" effect.

output: To establish the camera's credentials, Google brought legendary portrait photographer Annie Leibovitz on stage to talk about her experience shooting with the Pixel 4 over the past 12 months.

instruction:

output: Machine learning is still a strong focus for every aspect of Google's new smartphones, relying on "computational photography" to improve its HDR+ mode by combining up to nine different images.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:

output: New dual exposure controls offer separate sliders for brightness and shadows, allowing users to preview HDR+ in real-time.

output: The phone also relies on machine learning for improved auto white balance and an enhanced Night Sight night mode, which is sensitive enough to capture the Milky Way in the night sky.

instruction:

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
TAMPA, Flórída  (AP) – Sjónvarpsfréttakona í Flórída þakkar athugulum áhorfanda fyrir að hafa tekið eftir hnúð á hálsi hennar og sent henni tölvupóst um að hún ætti að láta athuga hann.
output: TAMPA, Fla.  (AP) - A television news reporter in Florida is crediting an eagle-eyed viewer for noticing a lump on her neck and emailing her that she should get it checked out.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Victoria Price, fréttakona hjá WFLA í Tampa, fór að þessum ráðum og greindist með krabbamein.
output: Victoria Price, a reporter for WFLA in Tampa, followed the advice and was diagnosed with cancer.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Price sagði á Twitter að hún færi í skurðaðgerð á mánudaginn til að láta fjarlægja æxlið, skjaldkirtilinn og nokkra eitla.
output: Price tweeted that she is undergoing surgery on Monday to remove the tumor, her thyroid and a couple of lymph nodes.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Læknirinn sagði að það væri að dreifa sér, en ekki of mikið, og við erum vongóð um að þetta verði mín fyrsta og síðasta aðgerð,“ sagði hún.
output: "Doctor said it's spreading, but not too much, and we're hopeful this will be my first and last procedure," she said.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Áhorfandinn sendi Price tölvupóst í síðasta mánuði og sagði að hnúðurinn minnti hana á hnúð sem hún hefði haft.
output: The viewer emailed Price last month, saying the lump reminded her of one she had had.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Price, sem er 28 ára gamall rannsóknarblaðamaður, sagði í vikunni að slagorð sjónvarpsstöðvarinnar hennar væri „8 í liði með þér“.
output: Price, 28, an investigative reporter, said this week that her television station's catchphrase is "8 On Your Side."

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„En hlutverkin víxluðust nýlega þegar áhorfandi var í liði með MÉR og ég gæti ekki verið þakklátari,“ sagði Price.
output: "But the roles recently reversed when I found a viewer on MY side, and I couldn't be more grateful," Price said.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
„Ég verð að eilífu þakklát konunni sem gerði sér far um að senda mér tölvupóst, algjörlega ókunnugri konu.
output: "I will be forever grateful for the woman who went out of her way to email me, a total stranger.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Henni bar engin skylda til þess, en hún gerði það samt.
output: She had zero obligation to, but she did anyway.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Talandi um að vera með manni í liði.“
output: Talk about being on your side, huh?"

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Hluta útivistarsvæðisins Jeronimo Open Space lokað tímabundið eftir tvær árásir sléttuúlfa – CBS Los Angeles
output: Section Of Jeronimo Open Space Temporarily Closes After 2 Coyote Attacks - CBS Los Angeles

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Tveir voru bitnir af sléttuúlfum nærri Oso Creek-gönguleiðinni við Jeronimo-veg í Mission Viejo á laugardagsmorgun og loka þurfti leiðinni tímabundið.
output: Two people were bit by coyotes near Oso Creek Trail along Jeronimo Road in Mission Viejo Saturday morning, causing a temporary closure at the trail.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Laura Wittmer segist sjá sléttuúlfa nánast á hverjum morgni og yfirleitt reynir hún að forðast þá bara, en á laugardagsmorgun kom einn beint að henni og beit hana í fótinn.
output: Laura Wittmer said she sees coyotes almost every morning when she's running and typically just tries to avoid them, but on Saturday morning, one came directly toward her and bit her on the leg.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Gönguleiðinni hefur verið lokað á meðan árásirnar eru rannsakaðar.
output: As investigations continue into the attacks, the trail has been closed.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Mission Viejo-borg birti tíst þar sem sagði: „Í dag tilkynntu tveir ólíkir aðilar um að sléttuúlfur hefði bitið manneskju.  Dýravelferðarþjónusta Mission Viejo er að vinna í málinu í samstarfi við deild fiska- og dýralífs, og hluta Jeronimo Open Space hefur verið lokað.  Sýnið aðgát og verið á verði þegar þið eruð á ferð þar sem mikið er um villt dýr.“
output: The City of Mission Viejo said in a tweet, "Today, 2 different parties reported coyote bites to a human.  MV Animal Services is working with the Department of Fish & Wildlife on this matter and a section of Jeronimo Open Space has been closed.  Please be aware and vigilant when you are out where wildlife is prevalent."

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Wittmer reyndi að slá sléttuúlfinn af sér með vatnsflösku.
output: Wittmer tried to fight the coyote off by hitting it with a water bottle.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Hún hringdi í neyðarlínuna til að fá far að bílnum sínum en gat sjálf ekið á neyðarmóttöku.
output: She called 911 to get a ride to her car but was able to drive herself to the emergency room.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Sléttuúlfurinn hvarf í hlíðarnar en opinberir starfsmenn vonast til að geta rekið hann og prófað hann fyrir hundaæði.
output: The coyote disappeared into the hills but officials are hoping to track it down and check it for rabies.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Wittmer fær meðferð við hundaæði sem varúðarráðstöfun næstu tvær vikur.
output: Meantime, Wittmer will undergo rabies treatments as a precaution over the next two weeks.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Hún sagði að þetta ógnvekjandi atvik myndi ekki halda henni frá morgunhlaupunum en að héðan í frá myndi hún velja annan stað.
output: She said the scary encounter won't stop her from her early morning runs but that from now on, she'll choose a different spot.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Ástand hins einstaklingsins sem var bitinn er ekki ljóst.
output: The condition of the other coyote bite victim is unclear.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Mótmælendum kynþáttahaturs lendir saman við lögreglu í Seattle
output: Anti-racism protesters clash with police in Seattle

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Átök í Seattle á sunnudaginn milli lögreglu og mótmælenda gegn kynþáttahatri enduðu með því að fjöldi fólks var handtekinn, en óánægja kraumar meðal almennings vegna áætlana Donalds Trump Bandaríkjaforseta um að senda fjölda alríkislögreglumanna inn í helstu borgir.
output: Clashes in Seattle between police and anti-racism protesters resulted in dozens of arrests on Sunday, as public anger mounts over US President Donald Trump's planned "surge" of federal agents into main cities.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Mótmæli gegn kynþáttahatri og lögregluofbeldi hafa kviknað í kjölfar dauða George Floyd, óvopnaðs þeldökks manns, í Minneapolis í maí.
output: Demonstrations against racism and police brutality have been ignited by the death in Minneapolis of unarmed African-American George Floyd in May.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Mótmælendur í Seattle skáru á hjólbarða bíla og brutu glugga í hjólhýsum á mótmælunum á laugardaginn, sem varð til þess að lögregla lýsti yfir óeirðaástandi og tæmdi göturnar með piparúða og blossasprengjum.
output: Protesters in Seattle slashed car tires and smashed trailer windows during the demonstrations on Saturday, prompting police to declare a riot and clear the streets with pepper spray and flash-bang grenades.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Mótmælendur kveiktu líka í hjólhýsum á byggingarsvæði fyrir væntanlegt unglingafangelsi.
output: Protesters also set fire to trailers by a construction site for a youth detention facility.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Lögreglan kvaðst hafa handtekið 45 manns, en 21 lögreglumaður hefði meiðst.
output: Police said 45 people were arrested while 21 officers were injured.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Mótmælagangan var haldin til stuðnings mótmælunum sem standa yfir í nágrannaborginni Portland í Oregon-ríki.
output: The march was in support of ongoing protests in nearby Portland, Oregon.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Portland er í sviðsljósinu eftir að Trump fyrirskipaði afar umdeildar róttækar aðgerðir alríkislögreglumanna, í óþökk yfirvalda á staðnum, sem segja lögreglumennina beita óhóflegu valdi.
output: Portland has taken centre stage for the highly controversial crackdown by federal agents ordered by Trump -- one that is not supported by local officials, who say officers use excessive force.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Mótmælagöngur hafa verið haldnar í Austin í Texas, sem og Louisville í Kentucky, New York, Omaha og Nebraska, Oakland og Los Angeles í Kaliforníu og Richmond í Virginíu.
output: Protesters have marched in Austin, Texas, as well as Louisville, Kentucky; New York; Omaha, Nebraska; California's Oakland and Los Angeles, and Richmond in Virginia.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Í Austin, höfuðborg Texas-ríkis, var einn skotinn til bana í vopnuðum átökum í miðbænum á laugardagskvöld, að sögn lögreglu.
output: In Austin, a man was killed in a shooting that broke out Saturday night at a protest in the downtown area of the Texas state capital, police said.

instruction:
Translate the following text from Icelandic to English:
Samhliða mótmælunum háir Trump sífellt erfiðari baráttu um endurkjör í nóvember, og hefur tileinkað sér harða löggæslustefnu.
output: The protests come as Trump faces an increasingly tough battle for re-election in November, and is campaigning on a "law and order" platform.
